Summary: Everything was perfect, nice and clean. The cleaning ladies really do a great job. Everything smelled so good from the moment I entered and checked in to them setting up breakfast for us. That was delicious. Thank you all.

Room is clean and comfortable and staff were great! Hot breakfast and a good selection of food.. check in was easy and parking was available and nearby for us. Did not hear a lot of noise in the rooms either which was nice

The location was good, across the Toy Story parking lot which you can take to the park or you can walk to the park. Free parking and breakfast is always a plus. The rooms where clean and beds where fairly comfortable. A lot of space for 3 adults and 3 children.
Room tip: Parking can get full but they also have underground parking.

Summary: Bed was so comfy. Breakfast was awesome and I loved the Gift shop inside the lobby. Enjoyed the outdoor pool and jacuzzi. Staff was very friendly. Plus it was close to Disneyland. Overall I had a goodnight at the Hotel.

Summary Heading: Very clean, beds were comfortable and the front desk agents were awesome! You really can’t beat the price for the value!
Summary: I felt so welcomed and safe in this hotel! The front desk agents were very kind and friendly, amber really went the extra mile to make us feel more than welcome and I wanna say thank you. The rooms were also very clean 10/10 would recommend. Plus the price, you can’t beat it!! We were staying for a Disney visit :)

The room, service and breakfast were exemplary. The staff is personable and helpful. Free parking too!  I am a return customer and will continue to book here for our trips to Disneyland. The park is only a 10 - 15 minute walk away.

Summary Heading: Stay was good but they need to fix their key cards
Summary: Overall good. Food and stay was great but the key cards did not work constantly. It was annoying having to walk back 4 times to get in to my room. The beds were confortable but you need a key to exit the parking

Jr Suite was clean, large and had comfortable beds. Grandma and two teenage boys had plenty of room and each had our own bed. Front desk staff was not overly friendly, but they were efficient. Store was open both times I was in the lobby (evening & early morning) - I had read reviews mentioning store never seemed to be open.  No problem finding parking. The hotel is directly across the street from Toy Story parking lot, so a fairly short walk to catch a shuttle to the parks. Breakfast was pretty sad; I've had better 'free breakfast' at other Disneyland area  hotels. Overall though, I would recommend and would stay again.

Watched fireworks from the balcony, great free breakfast and free parking. Walk to the park was about 20 minutes but we walked to the Toy Story shuttle and took that as well. Only gripe would be that the store was rarely open but there were vending machines so that helped. Oh and loved the 2 rooms and the bunk bed. Amazing for our family of 5!
Manager Response: Dear jjamie09 We are thankful and very much appreciative that you have taken the time to post about your recent stay at our property. We are privileged to have a great team of colleagues that consistently deliver a unique guest experience. We look forward to having you here with us again in the near future.

Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful. They kept our bags while we went to the park before our check in time and when we did come back to check in they had a goodie bag waiting for us at the front desk with waters and snacks!
Manager Response: Dear Windik2023 We are thankful and very much appreciative that you have taken the time to post about your recent stay at our property. Summary Heading: Perfect place for our family Disneyland vacation!
Summary: The price was so cheap yet the service was 5 star. I took my 3 children to Disneyland for 1 day only so we stayed 1 night there and got to Disneyland when it opened at 8am. They serve an amazing hot breakfast so we started our memorable day out with plenty of energy and full stomachs.
Manager Response: Dear 310shaunag, We are thankful and very much appreciative that you have taken the time to post about your recent stay at our property. We are privileged to have a great team of colleagues that consistently deliver a unique guest experience. We look forward to having you here with us again in the near future.

Summary: Nice big room, perfect for our 3 adults and 2 young children.   Breakfast was nice good variety, but was only warm at best, never hot on any of the. 5 days.  No housekeeping for a  6 day stay.  Desk staff were very nice
Manager Response: Dear 538donnaw We are thankful and very much appreciative that you have taken the time to post about your recent stay at our property. We are privileged to have a great team of colleagues that consistently deliver a unique guest experience. We look forward to having you here with us again in the near future.

Summary Heading: A nice stay for the 100th Celebration at Disneyland
Summary: The hotel stay was really nice. My friend and I felt the beds were really comfortable,  with the right amount of pillows and blankets. The room was very clean and the complimentary breakfast had a good selection along with freshly made coffee. I will definitely stay here again. It was a pleasure speaking to all of the staff, everyone is so friendly.
Manager Response: Dear C7563vnlaurah We are thankful and very much appreciative that you have taken the time to post about your recent stay at our property. We are privileged to have a great team of colleagues that consistently deliver a unique guest experience. We look forward to having you here with us again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Solid crash pad for weary Disney travelers
Summary: The Cortona was perfect for myself and my teenage son to have a landing place after three days at Disney. Solid breakfast, clean rooms, they even let us check in early on our arrival date. The staff helped us connect with the Anaheim transit shuttle for easy transport to the parks and it was a reasonable Uber from the Orange County Airport.
Manager Response: Dear Compass76380 We are thankful and very much appreciative that you have taken the time to post about your recent stay at our property. We are privileged to have a great team of colleagues that consistently deliver a unique guest experience. We look forward to having you here with us again in the near future.

Summary: We love staying at cortona because of staff friendliness and breakfast selection. This stay almost earned 5 stars. Only thing that could improve is inside bathroom. Shower curtain is too short, made floor wet every time we showered. The bathroom vent only makes noise, does not properly work so mold was building up around vent. Once those things are fixed, I will give 5 stars.
Manager Response: Dear Anaid6767wd We are thankful and very much appreciative that you have taken the time to post about your recent stay at our property. We are privileged to have a great team of colleagues that consistently deliver a unique guest experience. We look forward to having you here with us again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Fantastic location, free parking, friendly staff.
Summary: Everyone working here is so friendly and helpful! They have a lot of information and great tips for the Disney Parks. Fantastic location - can walk to Disney and on the same side of the street. Nice little store for anything you forgot at home and a nice continental breakfast. The coffee shocked us the most. It was really good! Definitely would stay here again. Free parking is a HUGE money saver. Most hotels here charge $20+ per night.
Manager Response: Dear genjen1973 We are thankful and very much appreciative that you have taken the time to post about your recent stay at our property. We are privileged to have a great team of colleagues that consistently deliver a unique guest experience. We look forward to having you here with us again in the near future.

Summary: This hotel popped up as a friendly neighboring hotel for Disney and it was great.! Nice area and incredible people at the front desk helping me and my girlfriend feel safe and comfortable. Will consider staying at this hotel in the future.!!
Manager Response: Dear Ivandr320km We are thankful and very much appreciative that you have taken the time to post about your recent stay at our property. We are privileged to have a great team of colleagues that consistently deliver a unique guest experience. We look forward to having you here with us again in the near future.

Summary: The room was nice and clean. Staff were friendly and courteous. The breakfast was ok, small pancakes,  sausage, and egg with toast. Parking lot does get full by the end of the night and you might have to park far away from your room. But other than that, it was a good experience.
Manager Response: Dear Solorzano_familia We are thankful and very much appreciative that you have taken the time to post about your recent stay at our property. We are privileged to have a great team of colleagues that consistently deliver a unique guest experience. We look forward to having you here with us again in the near future.

Summary: Hotel is 1/2 mile to the Toy Story parking lot with Disney shuttle busses so you don't need to rent a car. Breakfast was fine but even though it closes at 9:30 at 9:15 they started to close down and didn't put out anymore food so unless you got there early you had limited hot choices especially for my vegetarian daughter. The rooms were clean, more or less. I went to take the plastic bag out of the garbage can and found a used condom. Not exactly want you want to see. The room was a nice size with plenty of space. There were 2 sinks outside of the toilet/ shower area which is nice for getting ready in the morning. The fridge was pretty big but I had to turn it up pretty high to keep the food cold. It was set to 4 and our food went bad. The pool area was nice and set off the
Manager Response: Dear Sightsee53973590429 We are thankful and very much appreciative that you have taken the time to post about your recent stay at our property. Summary Heading: Easy Location, Easy to Work With
Summary: Still a budget motel, but easy to work with, efficient, ideal location. The triple rooms are gigantic. The double rooms are also quite large. Staff is friendly and responsive. We came with a group of middle schoolers but would stay as a family.

Summary: The hotel was a good location, clean, secure, had hot breakfast and the bed was so comfortable.  I’d definitely stay here again!!  We have no complaints.  The front desk guy was super pleasant.  Having to write a minimum of 200 characters for this review is nuts though.
Manager Response: Dear nicki86g,  Thanks for staying with us! We're glad you enjoyed our great location in Anaheim. We hope you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Enjoyed our stay at cortona inn and suites.The staff was AMAZING!! The rooms were clean beds comfy and they had FREE breakfast. Close enough to walk to disney.will definitely stay again and recommend it to friends.
Manager Response: Dear 257 pricillac Thank you for being our guest and for writing such a gracious review.  We value the flattering remarks, and we are glad you enjoyed our inspired service.  We look forward in welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Upon check in I was asked for my Visa card for a $50 holding deposit, I was also asked for identification so I gave the staff member my drivers licence. We had already prepaid this hotel in full and there is no mini bar so not sure what the $50 US was all about! She gave me back my drivers licence and the card to access the room but not my Visa card. I asked her for my Visa Card and she told me that she had given it back to me, which she most definitely did not. Of course I said No you haven’t then she looked around on the desk and said well it’s not here I gave it back to you. By this stage I was getting quite distraught as we are from Australia and that Visa card had all our USD on it, this fiasco went on for at least 10 minutes and she even said she was going to look on the
Manager Response: Dear Siandra, Thank you for staying with us and for giving us the opportunity of hosting your stay.  My apologies for the confusion of the and card during your check-in.  We're sorry to hear your recent visit wasn't up to par.  Please know we greatly appreciate your feedback.    We sincerely hope you give us another opportunity in the future.

Summary: Beds & pillows were great. Room was large and clean. Could use some maintenance though (bathroom door sticks). Breakfast was good with a variety of items. Love that the hotel is walking distance to Disney. Staff were friendly.
Manager Response: Tropicalty,  Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: Comfy beds, mile from Disney, solid breakfast included. The rooms were pretty nice and definitely suited us for our needs. No real complaints. Our family of 4, two adults and two small children had a good time.
Manager Response: Dear JeffreypN8834LB,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review and sharing your feedback with others on TripAdvisor!  I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary: The Cortona inn and suites was a nice place to stay for our Disneyland trip. It’s conveniently located, either walk to park (20 minutes) or to Toy Story parking lot (10 minutes), offers free breakfast, and has super friendly front desk staff.
Manager Response: Dear Anne W,  Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: Everyone was kind and helpful. Pretty clean. I would return to stay. Close to Disneyland and shuttles. Was in walking distance to different foods places. I would return to Cortona for a future Disneyland visit.
Manager Response: Dear ems1014,  Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: We will see you next time we're in town
Summary: Pros- the staff! They are amazing.  Breakfast was delicious.  The cleaning ladies were efficient and very kind. Queen bed was very comfortable  Cons- our door lock kept zeroing out our card key.  We were there 7 days, it happened 6 times.  It's needs a repair.  Gate had the same issue 3 times.   Twin beds were very hard.  Had to sleep with my elderly dad in queen bed because the twin on the bunk was so uncomfortable.    Everything else was fantastic.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for your family Disneyland vacation
Summary: We stayed in a suite for 4 nights and it was the perfect size for our family. We enjoyed the breakfast and felt it had a good selection. We knew from check in that they clean on the 3rd day of your stay, but they were very helpful if you needed anything in between then. We were there for Disney, so we were only in the room to sleep each night. Wouldn't mind staying there again. We were on the 3rd floor and it had a wonderful view of the fireworks.
Manager Response: Dear brendaeE3290JJ,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review and sharing your feedback with others on TripAdvisor! We greatly appreciate your comments and can’t express to you our gratitude for your kind words about our hotel and our colleagues. I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary Heading: Greta hotel when you’re in the park all day
Summary: Close enough to walk to Disneyland .8 miles. The breakfast had everything you’d want, eggs, sausage, breads, fruit. Staff was friendly. There’s a hot tub and pool, coffee in lobby at all times. Definitely a great hotel to sleep, shower and change when all you day is in the parks
Manager Response: Dear Alycia W,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review and sharing your feedback with others on TripAdvisor! We greatly appreciate your comments and can’t express to you our gratitude for your kind words about our hotel and our colleagues. I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with family
Summary: The hotel was very nice. Clean, comfortable beds including the roll away bed. Rooms included a frig and  microwave. The breakfast was decent. Hot sausage and egg daily. Waffles or pancakes, toasts etc. orange and apple juice, coffee and tea.
Manager Response: Dear A44851Gsusanm,  Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: Xochitl, Joy, Manny, Sergio and the crew are the BEST! But Xochitl more so. Excellent customer service . They were very helpful and took all  my dad jokes like a champ. Easy convenient check-in even with three rooms parking was a bit tight with a 15 passenger van but doable. Hot breakfast everyday convenience to Disneyland was awesome. Would have gave it five stars but I always leave room for improvement.
Manager Response: Dear Dre907, Thank you for your loyalty towards our hotel, and for sharing about your stay at Cortona Inn & Suites, Anaheim Resort. We value the flattering remarks, and we are glad you enjoyed our inspired service. We are committed to quality and craft and are pleased knowing our accommodations and knowledgeable staff enhanced your visit with us. Your suggestions are greatly appreciated.

Summary: I booked this hotel because I had a great coupon from my credit card. I wasn’t expecting much, and just wanted a place in walking distance to Disney. The costumer service is amazing. They were very kind and accommodating. The place is very clean, and the free parking and breakfast made it the perfect place for our group. I will book again the next time I am in town.
Manager Response: Dear Q7816XSkristiner,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review and sharing your feedback with others on TripAdvisor! We greatly appreciate your comments and can’t express to you our gratitude for your kind words about our hotel and our colleagues. I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary Heading: Clean, Comfy, friendly helpful staff, and great value for money!
Summary: We've stayed at dozens of budget hotels near Disney over the decades, & this was one of the best ever. Staff was very helpful, & went above & beyond when our car battery died! We will stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear U3740IPjaneth,  Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: The staff was extremely friendly and helpful.  The rooms were clean and we enjoyed having breakfast each morning.  It was within walking distance to Disneyland.  The hot pool was hot, but the “heated” pool wasn’t heated.  Overall, a nice experience

Wonderful hotel everything was so close and the rooms were clean and nicely done 10 out of 10 would stay here again. Walking distance plus the shuttles are close. The breakfast offered was good and free so enjoy it.

Maybe a block too far from Disneyland but in the plus side it has microwave and a disable refrigerator and no charge for parking. The room was pretty clean not they should have replaced the toilet seat. The continental breakfast is better than some of the ones I’ve had in past.

This hotel was clean, spacious, and comfortable. It was a 15 minute walk to Disneyland, straight down the street. There was a nice breakfast as well with hot and cold items (eggs, potatoes, sausage, cereal, juice, coffee, etc). We recommend!

Very pleased with our 4 night stay, meeting family for a big Disney trip. This hotel has friendly welcoming staff, clean comfy beds  towels, bathroom, a fridge AND microwave, has a decent variety of FREE breakfast items, and it's close to Disney parks and Toy Story parking lot. Thank you!!

Room was very clean, breakfast had great selections  service was great, rooms are dated  TV kept turning off on its own, very noisy,  loved the n/c parking, easy to get to park shuttle, plenty off restaurants within walking distance,  price OK.

Stayed for 6 nights in early November. Had room on 3rd floor...quiet enough. Windows are old so sound of people etc walking by isnt muffled too well. I had trepidations staying here because of distance to Disney but I ended up walking there and back 3 days in a row. Very safe..altho I left the park before it got dark. Room was very clean altho some areas of carpet were missed. Everything worked well..2 things that needed attention were mentioned upon checkout. Staff very nice. Breakfast was adequate and hot. Sausage patties every day with different eggs or pancakes.seasoned potaoes and biscuits on a rotating basis. i never saw bagels but the muffins are fresh. Wish they had yogurt but the CVS down the street sells it. The coffee was very good..wonder what brand they use. I sat

Summary Heading: Squeaking clean rooms, very nice staff, everything there what I need: Perfect place to stay!
Summary: Cortona Inn made a very good impression the first 10 minutes I was there: There was some mix-up with bookings.com which I had used which was absolutely not the fault of the hotel (nor mine). The clerk at the check-in counter (Manny) explained to me what the problem was (apparently this was not the first time bookings.com screwed up) and then solved it for me!   I stayed for 4 days for a meeting in the Convention Center (a pleasant 3 minute walk away). Each day I was impressed with how well the hotel is run. One day I worked in my room the whole day and housekeeping did not do the usual rapping-on-the-door spiel; instead they skipped housekeeping which is exactly what I wanted. All other days they made up the room nicely, including cleaning everything to clinical standards.  Good

Good place for the price. Little loud sometimes but the beds were comfortable and the spa was hot. Breakfast is no frills. It'll do the job.Bit of a walk to the park but it's near everything. Staff was very supportive.

Very pleased with our stay for a Disneyland trip!! Parking lot is secured by a ticket system which is validated by staff at check in, free parking is a great perk since not really offered anymore these days, especially in this resort area! Also staff was very friendly, room was clean, water was hot, beds are comfortable and they have free breakfast to boot which was also pretty good everythingyou need was offered! Thanks Cortona Inn, we will be back for sure!  The Toy Story parking lot is just across the street, but walking distance to the parks isn't bad.

It was great! We took advantage of the jacuzzi and the morning breakfast. It was nice to have a refrigerator and a microwave. The beds were great, soft and big. The staff was very accommodating and friendly.

Summary Heading: Great place when going to Disneyland
Summary: The beds felt fantastic after a long day at Disneyland. The hot breakfast was delightful to satisfy that hunger before heading over to the park. Front desk was very helpful with any questions and parking was free which is awesome!

Summary Heading: Good breakfast and easy access to shuttle
Summary: I came to go to Disneyland with a friend and we had a great stay! The beds were comfortable, the breakfast was great, and it was easy to catch the toy story parking lot shuttles to Disneyland. I wish they would clean the room every day, but otherwise the stay was fantastic.

Very good budget hotel. Rooms are a bit dated and nothing fancy but are very big.    Walls don’t block much of the sound, we were on the second floor and could hear people walking over us very late at night. If you are a light sleeper ask for the top floor  Good breakfast and a 20 minute walk to the parks.   Parking is included and you can stay until midnight of the checkout day ( we did that )

We stayed here to go to an Angels game. Honestly the rooms were great. They were big and didn't expect that the room had a little sitting room area with a TV as well as a TV where the beds were. You could close off the sitting area from the area where the beds were. I was extremely happy. Beds were comfortable and I slept very well. I would definitely stay again.

Summary Heading: Awesome Place to Stay While Visiting Disneyland
Summary: Loved the Free Parking, Buffet Breakfast, Shuttle Across the Street in the Toy Story Parking Lot. The Staff was great, the room was big enough, the hotel was clean and kept up, quiet. The pool was fun! the little store was convenient for the things we forgot to bring. Disneyland was in walking distance 15-20 minutes, if you didn't want to take the free shuttle. Great location, a lot of restaurants close by...
Manager Response: Dear Celia R. Thank you for staying with us!  We work hard to ensure that all of our guest enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Want to save $75 for parking at Disneyland? Stay at Cortona Inn & Suites. Want to have a comfortable and clean hotel at a very affordable rate for Anaheim? Stay at Cortona Inn & Suites. Want to have a free continental-style breakfast? Stay at Cortona Inn & Suites. My wife and I are thrilled to have found this older, but very nice hotel that is only a 20 minutes walk to Disneyland. It is very affordable compared to the nearby hotels. It is cheaper than Anaheim hotels that are a couple of miles away from Disneyland. Unlike most hotels within a couple of miles of Disneyland, Cortona Inn & Suites does not charge for parking. That can be a savings of as much as $25 per day! Because this hotel is just a 20 minutes walk from Disneyland's two parks, we kept our car in the hotel parking
Manager Response: Dear Stephen V, Thank you so much for the wonderful review and sharing your feedback with others on TripAdvisor! We greatly appreciate your comments and can't express to you our gratitude for your kind words about our hotel and our colleagues.  I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: My friends and I arrived to the Cortona at 11am on the first day of our reservation. We checked in and were told to return at 3pm when our room would be ready. We advised the staff that we would be at Disneyland for the day and would return much later that evening. The staff assured us that would be fine and our room would be ready whenever we were to arrived.  At 9pm we returned to the Cortona to check in. We had reserved the Toscana kid suite so each member of our party could have their own bed and were told that the room was not available. Staff from the Cortona did not call or attempt to contact us to advise us of this situation so we could attempt to deal with it earlier in the day, rather than late at night when we were tired from a day of travel and walking the park. The

I booked this cute hotel near Disneyland because eberywjere else was $200 or more per night. The great thing about this hotel is how affordable it is including complimentary breakfast and parking. It was convenient and close to the bus station to catch the Toy Story bus line to Disneyland. I don't like staying on the ground floor of any hotel and this hotel was more than happy to accomodate my request. All the staff was very friendly and welcoming. Due to COVID, I have since put the 'do not disturb' sign on my door knob because it minimizes entry to my room. I had NO problems asking for additional linen or toiletries when I needed them. Staff was always friendly and willing to help you. Honestly, if you think about it, it's one less room for the staff to clean that day allowing
Manager Response: Dear Jaclynw267,  I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you for the terrific review and for recognizing our great team for taking care of you. I am glad that you enjoyed the hotel, and on behalf of all of us, Thank you again for your review. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel next time you are in Anaheim! Thank you from the entire staff.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: The Cortona is perfectly placed within walking distance of Disneyland, the Anaheim Convention Center and a ton of restaurants. With both parking and hot breakfast included, the Cortona Inn and Suites makes a great family budget hotel. The room was clean and semi modern. The pool was adequate for a budget local and was actually the same size as the neighboring higher end hotels. Underground parking was also available which helped ensure no one burned themselves on hot seatbelts via cars parked in the sweltering sun. There is one elevator for accessibility access to the three floors and multiple flights of stairs were also available to get your steps in. Only gripes were the pillows provided were small, too soft and lacked support, as well as the wifi would disconnect frequently

Great place to stay. Staff was very friendly and accommodating.  Breakfast buffet was well stocked withpancakes,  eggs sausage, fruit, oatmeal, muffins, toast, juices.  Room was clean. Would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear N1297GXmicheller, I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you for the terrific review and for recognizing our great team for taking care of you. I am glad that you enjoyed the hotel, and on behalf of all of us, Thank you again for your review. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel next time you are in Anaheim! Thank you from the entire staff.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: We have been to Anaheim 3 times. This was our first time staying at Cortona.  We got the kids suite. It was so spacious. The breakfast was good and loved that there was coffee at the lobby. The pool was nice and they have a bathroom near the pool. Best hotel in Anaheim. Can't wait to go again next year!
Manager Response: Dear edithelisa,  Thank you for being our guest and for writing such a gracious review.  We are delighted that our inspired service and surroundings exceeded your expectations and that you particularly loved our swimming pool.  We hope that this enriching experience will bring you and your family back to enjoy more of what we have to offer.  Thank you again for choosing the Cortona Inn & Suites, Anaheim resort.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Sergio was wonderful, he welcomed us and explained all we needed to know upon arrival. The breakfast was very good, best hotel provided meal I’ve had. No issues with my stay. Staff was all friendly and kind.
Manager Response: Dear anthonycastelan,  We are thankful and very much appreciative that you have taken the time to post about your recent stay at our property. We are privileged to have a great team of colleagues that consistently deliver a unique guest experience. Your kind words about the outstanding service delivered throughout your stay is a testament to the hard work they all put in day to day to exceed your expectations. We look forward to having you here with us again in the near future.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: The rooms are old and dated. We understood that when we booked our reservation.  The breakfast is mediocre. We expected that for the price we paid.  The room's hair dryer was broken (did not heat, electrical danger). It took us four trips to the front desk over three days before someone came to our room to replace the hair dryer. This is not acceptable.  We were told that our room would be cleaned after our third night. After three nights housekeeping took out the trash and dropped off new towels, soap & shampoo. They did not make the beds. They did not change the sheets. They did not vacuum the room at all.   If you want a place that provides good customer service, this is NOT the place for you.
Manager Response: Dear Tom D,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I am very disappointed to hear about your experience at the hotel. We are committed to providing our guests with the highest quality services and facilities. It seems that we were not able to execute an exemplary hotel stay experience with regard to the amenities and room cleanliness.  Please accept our sincere apologies for any discomfort it may have caused you. The feedback we receive from our valued guests, like you, enables us to target problem areas. We welcome any opportunity to improve.  We know you have many choices when it comes to lodging and we hope you will continue to choose Cortona Inn & Suites for your travel needs.  Sincerely,

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights for our Disneyland visit. Rooms are clean and the beds are comfortable. The breakfast was good. Eggs cooked differently each day with sausage and either pancakes or potatoes. Good selection of cereal and bagels and fruit, etc. There is no elevator so you need to climb the stairs to 2nd and 3rd floor. Free EV charging. It’s across the street from the Toy Story parking lot so we used the Disney shuttle from there. Otherwise it’s about a 20 minute walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear X3627LTtimk,  Thank you for staying us!  We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much.

Summary: Nice location. Secure parking which is nice. They have a hot breakfast and a short walk to the Disney bus transportation or a 20 min walk if you would like. The walk is nice in the morning and then take the bus when you leave the park that night when your tired.
Manager Response: Dear donnadN4360KB,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay experience with us. We are happy you enjoyed all the hotel has to offer. Thank you again and we look forward to your return in the not so distant future.

Summary: We booked our stay at the Cortona Inn through Costco Travel. We had 3 nights stay while we went to the Disneyland Resorts. The Hotel is a 15 minute walk to the parks which saved us a lot of money on parking. They let us park before check in so we could leave our car in their gated and secure lot while we enjoyed the parks and went back after Disneyland closed to get our room key. They also let us leave our car in the lot until midnight after we checked out so we could go to the parks the same day we left and then come back to grab our vehicle. These accommodations were fantastic on top of a clean room, great pool, and delicious breakfast that Sergio  let us enjoy the morning we arrived, prior to check in that afternoon. Sergio gave us great information about the hotel and the
Manager Response: henrybD3065KN,  We are thankful and very much appreciative that you have taken the time to post about your recent stay at our property.  We are privileged to have a great team of colleagues that consistently deliver a unique guest experience.  Your kind words about the outstanding service delivered throughout your stay is a testament to the hard work they all put in day to day to exceed your expectations.  We look forward to having your here with us again the near future.

Summary: The room was not very clean. Hair in the bathroom and on the bed. Our extra security lock on the door looked like it was put back on with command strips and tape and screws that didn’t feel very secure. Glad I wasn’t staying by myself so I didn’t feel too unsafe. Not a great experience. Would have gone elsewhere but my work booked this room for me for a conference.
Manager Response: Dear sierrad726,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I am very disappointed to hear about your experience at the hotel. We are committed to providing our guests with the highest quality services and facilities. It seems that we were not able to execute an exemplary hotel stay experience with regards cleanliness of the room. Please accept our sincere apologies for any discomfort it may have caused you. The feedback we receive from our valued guests, like you, enables us to target problem areas. We welcome any opportunity to improve.  We know you have many choices when it comes to lodging and we hope you will continue to choose Cortona Inn & Suites for your travel needs.  Sincerely,

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Cortona inn. The room was great with a king bed, fold-out couch and bunk beds. It is a great value so close to Disneyland. The staff was friendly and helpful. Parking was a bit of a problem returning late from Disneyland.
Manager Response: margaretsC7378QW  Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if going to Disneyland
Summary: Good breakfast. Helpful staff. You can walk to shuttle lot- don’t pay for parking if you stay here ( this would have been helpful to know)  It’s not an amazing place, but got the job done and was very convenient.

We will leave an honest review and the GM's (Erika)response. #1. We were inconvienced with our window air conditioning unit not operating at all.  #2 We were inconvenience 8 times needing our room  keychanged(electronic). Their response" keep it away from electronics" Head scratches as EVERYONE should know this elementary rule!!! #3 The breakfast. This was the most inedible food we have ever put in our mouths. We had 12 other guest who will leave their independent reviews on here also.You might want to add a little to your savings and stay literally next door at the Hyatt  Thanks

This day was nice everything was just fine enjoyed the pool the continental breakfast was nice I wish I had a little later check out so I could have stayed a little bit longer would also been nice to have a little bit more TV channel selections movies Etc
Manager Response: richardsU8140MF,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay experience with us. We are happy you enjoyed all the hotel has to offer. Thank you again and we look forward to your return in the not so distant future.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Our stay was wonderful! The suite was roomy and gave us extra pillows. You also can’t beat the price per night being less then a mile walk to Disneyland and California Adventure park. It only took us approximately 15 minutes each way on foot.
Manager Response: Dear sandiekro,  Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Very nice 8 night stay at the Cortona Inn and Suites. Especially loved the beds, just so comfy. Breakfast was very good and the girls that run the breakfast area do a superb job. Check in and out was very efficient and staff were always very helpful. The pool and hot tub are well maintained. Within walking distance to the park. Thumbs up on all accounts.
Manager Response: Dear joangD2234FY,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your comments.  I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast and that our team provided great service.  We look forward in welcoming you back soon.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: The room looked exactly like what the pictures showed. Clean and friendly staff. It is an older hotel so it’s not all that sound proof. You can hear people talk when they are walking outside your room. You can also hear people above you especially if they have a heavy step. Breakfast was yummy! Close to Disneyland. Id recommend to anyone. Just minor things.
Manager Response: Hello Stilwella98,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback with the TripAdvisor community.  We look forward in welcoming you back soon.  Yours in hospitatliy,

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at Cortona Inn, room was clean and neat, hot and delicious breakfast every morning is provided, as well as wifi and TV. safety measures were applied due to COVID-19, making us feel safer. I will definitely book again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear 308ceciliae,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay experience with us. We are happy you enjoyed all the hotel has to offer. Thank you again and we look forward to your return in the not so distant future.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Very close to Disney land and California adventures walking to the park can be done or a quick ride in a Lyft or Uber. Great place to rest your head after a long day at the parks. Friendly staff and breakfast is included. Close to many restaurants.

Summary Heading: A nice place to stay if your looking for a place just for sleeping.
Summary: We (4 adults) stayed here for 5 days and 4 night at the end of June (2022). It was a 2 Queen bed hotel room.  I’ll start off by saying for the price, we were happy with our stay here. We came to Anaheim for the VidCon conversation.  The hotel room was old looking but had newer carpet, TV and the beds were comfy and clean. Air conditioner wasn’t the best, you had to have it set pretty cold to keep it cool in the room and the humidity down. The bathroom exhaust fan didn’t really work well, even if you keep the door closed for hours after using it, so the humidity from taking a shower stayed in the room.  A few minor issues a cured which we rolled with so it didn’t hinder our use of the room or make our stay any less enjoyable.  We were gone most every day so mainly used the room

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for convenience.
Summary: Convenient, spacious, breakfast provided, friendly staff, and within 1 mile of Disneyland. Check in and check out was easy, just make sure you have your license plate number when checking in as it is needed for parking/in and ot privileges.
Manager Response: Dear 922rose,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay experience with us. We are happy you enjoyed all the hotel has to offer. Thank you again and we look forward to your return in the not so distant future.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Cortona has nice employees, and provide a decent breakfast. It is within a mile of Disney and even closer to the Anaheim Convention Center. Plenty of dining within a short distance. Angels and Ducks are close, too.   Not an extravagant hotel that’s going to wow you, but it serves its purpose in a busy, convenient area.

For those of you who are looking for a quick sentence or two describing whether or not this property is worth staying at and care not to actually read the details...my quick review is ABSOLUTELY!!!!  Do not hesitate in booking this property for your vacation in Anaheim/Disneyland  Now for those individuals who actually like to read a bit more and want to know details....allow me to elaborate:  This was our first trip to Anaheim/Disneyland and we are constant Disney World vacationers, so you can imagine my surprise in seeing that there was little "Disney" properties available for my stay.  We initially were going to go the route of staying on Disney property but I just could not swallow the massive pill that was the incredibly high rate being charged.  We are a family of 4 ( 2
Manager Response: Dear Keith C,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review and sharing your feedback with others on TripAdvisor!  We greatly appreciate your comments and can't express to you our gratitude for your kind words about our hotel and our colleagues.  I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: A bit on the older side, a few plumbing problems that were annoying, though not horrible. Close to the Convention Center and Disney. Not a terrible price structure. The beds were comfortable and the place was clean. Certainly better that some other avaiable spots.

We stayed at Cortona Inn for a recent trip to Disneyland. We are a family of 5 so got the suite and having the bunk beds and sofa bed was a major plus. The rooms are very spacious and although we drove to the parks, it’s still close enough that you could walk. My only complaint is the size of the bathroom. I wish they would bigger, especially for a suite! Other than that, the staff was very friendly and the continental breakfast was a big plus.

What a gem of a motel so close to Disneyland. Nice clean rooms and a wonderful & friendly staff. I would definitely stay there again.  I wish I could have stayed longer to enjoy their pool. You can walk to Disneyland a mile away or take a quick Uber.
Manager Response: Gail J,  Thank you for staying with us for your travel needs.  We work hard to ensure that our property is ready to welcome our guest.  We look forward in welcoming you back once you return to visit Anaheim Resort.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: The staff was SUPER helpful and friendly. Our room was clean, spacious and welcoming. The blankets and bedding were a dream. Breakfast was amazing. There was also a little gift shop in the lobby with discount priced Disney souvenirs. The lady in the shop was friendly as well. If we ever visit Disneyland again, we will definitely stay here!!!
Manager Response: 145corneliag,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay experience with us. We are happy you enjoyed all the hotel has to offer. Thank you again and we look forward to your return in the not so distant future.  Thank you

Summary: Great experience! The room was clean and spacious, super comfortable. The sofa bed was a great feature. The hot breakfast was great. Close by to Disneyland. The staff at the front desk were friendly and helpful. Definitely will stay again.

Staff provided excellent customer service, which is always a must for me. Room was clean and beds comfortable. Close to Disney. Only thing that was not the near was parking. If you get there in afternoon, you have to drive around to find parking spot, just arrive early. Will definitely consider for future stays.
Manager Response: Dear anaiD6767WD,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your comments with the TripAdvisor community.  I'm sorry to hear that you had problems with parking.  We look forward in hosting your stay in the future.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Staff was very friendly. Was able to get early check in which was great. Hotel was about a 15 min walk to the park, love that. Parking was not free, I had to pay $28 upon departure. If the lot is full you have to use underground next door. Pool area was nice, 4 feet is the deepest. Rooms are pretty out dated, but the beds were SUPER comfy! I will admit, there was a huge roach on day 2, that we couldn’t kill, and after it hid we couldn’t find it again. Probably wouldn’t stay here with a family as the rooms are pretty small. We got 2 queens. It was just me & my boyfriend so we managed, but I do wish I would have spent the extra money and found a place w/ a larger, nicer room b/c it was a birthday trip. We drove (6 hours) but if you’re coming w/ a family, or from out or state,

Things I liked: Not noisy, close to Disney but about 20 minute walk. Pretty clean. Has small fridge and microwave, iron, blow dryer in room. Furniture in pretty good condition.  Has. "pretty good' free breakfast from 6:30-9:30am. Has a little store with Disney merch in lobby. Has an ok swimming pool. Bed and covers pretty comfy, not too hard or too soft. Good air conditioner.  Clean folded towels. Front desk employees were alright.  Did not like:  When you enter the room, smells musty due to humidity., I think. The painting/ wallpaper is buckling in some areas like bathroom and ceiling in the bedroom..but not badly ...that makes the property look old. I would add 1 or 2 more pictures to give the room a cozier look. I don't get the 4 little pillows on the bed, its quite

We have been staying at Cortona Inn for several years now when we visit Disneyland. The hotel is close to the Toy Story parking lot and we are able to walk there and back thus avoiding paying for parking. The rooms are always clean and comfortable. The free breakfast buffet is always good and so convenient. The staff is friendly and sometimes we are able to get an early checkin, which is always convenient since most visits we fly and don’t have a car to store our stuff while we wait for our room. If our room is not ready, we are able to store our bags at the hotel, which is a nice feature.
Manager Response: Dear M5428LCdianas,  Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Myself and my family stayed here for our first trip to Disneyland. We got to check in early after driving for hours at no cost. The breakfast was great and the shuttles that take you to Disneyland are right across the street from Disneyland where you can park your vehicle. We had a great stay.

Great price, free parking, hot breakfast, clean, smoking area, pool and hot tub, ice machine, mini fridge and microwave, vending machines, near lots of restaurants and stores, bus near the hotel straight to Disneyland, easy check in, friendly staff, just an all around great visit.

Friendly staff, and clean room.. The complimentary breakfast was good. Very close to Disneyland, we enjoyed our stay. We would stay here again, the price was excellent and the area had plenty of restaurants within walking distance.

We stayed here for 3 nights in May of 2022. I found the staff to be extremely helpful and courteous. The breakfast, which is not a grab bag, was okay. There were a few undercooked potatoes, and not a lot of healthy choices - but it was decent for what it was. It was free and filled the stomach so we didn't have to pay for breakfast at the park.   The rooms are outdated, but still comfortable. The sinks are uncomfortably low (and no, I didn't have a room with accommodations), and the shower knob (from the 70s at most) was hard to figure out!  The room AC is a window unit, and understandably noisy. Both rooms had dressers that would not stay shut, and one remote did not work - we didn't bother to ask for a new one as it was unused.   The pool was honestly great, loved that it

Clean room and comfy beds. Great value.  Only rated it four because they don’t have daily housekeeping which is an effort to minimize labor costs for employees in the hotel industry.  Breakfast included.

Summary Heading: Awesome family Disney stay at the Cortona Inn and Suites!
Summary: Our family just stayed at the Cortona Unn and Suites for the past 6 days and highly recommend it! Great location that is about a 15 minute walk from Disney. The breakfast they serve every morning (pancakes, eggs, sausage, oatmeal, biscuits and gravy) was a great added perk. Free parking was a great bonus and you could park underground when the upper lot filled. The pool and hot tub were great for the kids too. Clean rooms and grounds as well as a very friendly staff. We will br back and we highly reccomend staying here, especially if you are on a budget
Manager Response: Dear Natebo91,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay experience with us.  We are happy you enjoyed all the hotel has to offer.  Thank you again and we look forward to your return in the not so distant future.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary Heading: It was our 10 year wedding anniversary!!!!
Summary: It was amazing. We lovers the bed and the spa bathtub. Everyone was very friendly and helpful. We also could have breakfast if we wanted. The walk to Disneyland and back was not to bad. We will book a room here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kriskelly23,  Thank you for staying with us! We are happy that you enjoyed our Spa room.  We work hard to ensure that all of our guest enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much.

Summary: Cortona Inn was clean. friendly, and had good working accommodations. I would stay there again for a trip to Disneyland. They had a larger fridge, microwave, and TOTO toilets. The breakfast was good and convenient. The distance to Disneyland is walkable.
Manager Response: Dear mokuhara1,  Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: We stayed here for the first time and wasn’t disappointed. Room was clean, bed was comfy, plus the valet service was nice! We usually stay at the Clarion and after our horrible experience last time, we wanted a change. Breakfast is typical hotel food, but the comfort of the room is worth it! The shower was nice as well. 20 minute walk to Disneyland, some restaurants close by. Definitely will stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear 305alishac,  Thank you for staying with us!  I'm happy to hear that we met your expectations and that you were satisfied with our valet services.  Look forward in hosting your stay in the future.  Best Regards,

Summary: We stayed at Cortona after a long day at Disneyland and our room was ready although we checked in after midnight. The room was clean, fairly spacious and the beds were super comfortable. I’ve stayed at much bigger more mainstream hotels and my pet peeve is finding hair on the bed sheets, towels and in the room in general - well I found NO hair during my stay at Cortona! Kudos to the cleaning staff!!!    The extended free underground parking was so convenient and needed because the spaces located outside around the property were all taken. The TV cable choices had a great variety of programming.  I cannot rate the breakfast because I was too popped to make it there the next morning, but I was allowed to set up space at one of the dining tables to work on my laptop the next day
Manager Response: Dear L9981DWsheilam,  Thank you for choosing Cortona Inn for your lodging needs.  I appreciate you taking the time to comment about your recent stay at our hotel.  We are glad you found our rooms comfortable and clean and found our staff efficient and friendly.      We look forward to assisting you again when your travels return you to the area.  Yours in hospitality,

Summary: The hotel front desk persons were very friendly on our arrival. We found the room to be clean and were  happy to have a small refrigerator in the room. The beds were ok, but I have a bad back so would’ve liked something a bit firmer. A bonus is the breakfast with cereal, waffles, eggs and sausage. We loved the free parking. Also, the location is great for families going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Trixie1991,  Thank you for staying with us.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast buffet.  We look forward in welcoming you back soon!  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary Heading: Great hotel and with excellent staff
Summary: Well priced hotel with all the basic amenities. Options for breakfast was decent, but would have liked more vegetarian options (veggie sausages?). Pool was fun, location is very good for Disneyland. Standout was definitely the manager who checked us in (Mya), who went out of her way to upgrade us to a bigger/better room for the same price and was generally very helpful and sweet. Would definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Dear usama990,  Thank you for sharing about the hidden gem of Cortona Inn & Suites. Thank you for mentioning the team members that made your stay a great one. Thank you again and we look forward to your return in the not so distant future.

Summary: Close to disney walking distance. Good service. Decent breakfast. Good price for location. Only downside i have is parking. 2 times ive been there and i struggle to find parking. Most of the time i have to park in a basement parking under the hotel far away from room. There was also a time where i needed to use VIP so they can find a parking for me because i couldnt get parking at all. Maybe because they let anyone park there as long as they pay a fee instead of only guests. VIP was free due to lack of parking. Other than that its a good hotel. Will recomend
Manager Response: A5187KKalbertol,  Thank you for staying with us.  I'm sorry to hear that you had issues with parking.  Valet services are complimentary for our guest.  I'm glad to hear that they were able to assist you.  We look forward in welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We were very pleased with our room and accommodations at Cortona Inn.  The staff was very friendly, the location was perfect in proximity to Disneyland and the price was very reasonable.  The next time we’re in Anaheim again, we are staying here again.

First the complaints:  Interior doors squeaked loudly.  The bathroom door was too tight and not easily shut. The bathtub/shower had no grab bars or skid mat so it was very slippery and dangerous.  The Room A/C temperature settings were way off. Now the good:  Breakfast had a decent variety including hot items.  Room was quiet, bunk beds were comfortable and long enough for two over 6 feet.  Easy 20min walk to the parks.  Parking lot was always full, and you need a card to enter and exit.

My son decided to take me to Disney. We walked each day there and back with many other families.  It turned out to be the hottest Feb and busiest days at the parks. The hotel was fine. The free hot/cold breakfast was much better than we expected. There was plenty of food and regularly restocked.  The bedroom was a good size and we used the safe. Note the details on the safe are way out of date = such as the $25 for a lost was the key is $150.

Summary Heading: Disneyland trip with friends and family
Summary: We had a great time and enjoyed staying at the Cortona Inn and Suites. The staff are friendly, always ready to help with whatever you need. Halfway through our stay the air conditioning started making weird noises, they fixed it right away. We’ve stayed here before and we will again!
Manager Response: Dear Lbjerk,  Thank you for staying with us.  I'm happy to hear that our team was able to take care of the ac issue immediately.  We look forward in hosting your stay soon!

Summary: Cheaper hotel near convention center. The room I was in was clean, and nice enough, biggest downside, but not a problem for me, was that it had that cheaper hotel smell to the room I was in. Parking was also a bit tight. Had to double park to unload then go park the car in the underground parking. When I came up on the elevator I was in the lobby of the Hyatt next door! Close enough walk. Overall pleasant experience. Staff was super responsive and helpful. 5 minute walk to convention center once you learn how to navigate the secret opening in the hedge to get you into the Corona Hotel’s parking area.
Manager Response: Dear JuggleFrank,  Thank you for staying with us! We are indeed close to the Anaheim Convention Center.  We look forward in hosting your stay soon!

Summary: My husband and I stayed two nights and went to Disneyland. The room was very large and the King size bed was super comfortable! We loved the over sized 2 person jacuzzi tub that was in it’s owe little room across from the bathroom. The decor is a little out of date but no big deal. The price was good and it was super clean! The only down side was we were on the bottom floor and we could hear every step the people above us made. But the free parking made it worth it! Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 606melyndak,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay experience with us. We are happy you enjoyed all the hotel has to offer. Thank you again and we look forward to your return in the not so distant future.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Hotel close to park and restaurants. Good no frills hotel. Complimentary breakfast had many food items and juices.  Perfect for families with children as bunk bed suites were great. Decent value and clean.
Manager Response: Dear Prbell, Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  Happy belated birthday and thank you for staying with us.  We look forward to your return the not so distant future.

Summary: We always enjoy our stay at the Cortona. Clean rooms, pool, hot tub, breakfast, free parking and great staff! We will stay here again for sure! Great proximity to food, stores, Garden Walk, CVS, Walgreen’s’s. Great stay!
Manager Response: Dear MonaD E,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay experience with us.  We are happy you enjoyed all the hotel has to offer.  Thank you again and we look forward to your return in the not so distant future.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Good place for families, reasonable rates. Comes with a very basic breakfast, but its fast and gets you going for your busy day. Location is good, but still a long walk after a busy disney day. House keeping was only every 3 days, a little tough for family suites. Could have used fresh towels and toilet paper more often for sure. We had a goid time overall
Manager Response: Dear bryvancouver,  Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: Hotel room was decent and doable for the price. It’s a little out dated for me. Staff was friendly and helpful. Breakfast was ok, wish there was more choices. Washing machine front load smelled like mildew. Lots of stairs and the one elevator I used took forever for the door to close. No parking so you have to park down under ground. Not a lot of electrical outlets in the room. If you ask for towels shampoo or conditioner they give it to you asap. It’s 2-2 1/2 blocks from Disneyland which was decent to walk.
Manager Response: Dear 372chanh,  Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: About a 20 minute walk from the entry gate at the Disney parks. Nice clean rooms and friendly service. Something for everyone at the breakfast and free parking even on the day we arrived before the 3:00 PM check in. This saved having to get parking at Disneyland. Also, if you don’t want to walk, the Toy Story parking area is across the street so you can catch a tram from there.
Manager Response: Dear joshuahT2143XL,  Thank you for the terrific review and for recognizing our great team for taking care of you. I am glad that you enjoyed the hotel, and on behalf of all of us.  Thank you again for your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel next time you are in Anaheim! Thank you from the entire staff.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Simply amazing. I’ve stayed at a lot of hotels that are way over priced just because of the area they are located in. But when I stayed at the Cortona hotel. I have to admit I got my money’s worth. Super clean, quite, comfortable, a under ground parking garage with air conditioning!!! The rooms were clean, beds were comfortable and they were up to date. I will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear mickey19554,  Thank you for staying with us and giving us the opportunity of hosting your stay!  We are delighted to hear that we met your expectations and our team was able to take care  of your needs.  Thank you for your 5star Review and for sharing your comments with TripAdvisor family.  Yours in hospitality,

Summary Heading: Nice Location, Great Suite Size, Consider Better Sustainability Tho
Summary: We stayed here for our recent visit to Disney. Great location - about a 20-30 min walk on the main road to the parks. Suite size was nice and great for separated sleeping from kids. Breakfast was just okay - we were especially disappointed that the hotel is still using styrofoam plates, cups, plastic silverware, etc. I hope they might consider using more sustainable compostable paper products or real plates, as there is so much waste daily this hotel is generating from foam. Please consider all the kids you're hosting, and think about future sustainability for them. It is very wasteful.
Manager Response: Dear CALiving2022,  Thank you for staying with us!  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our location and rooms. Look forward in hosting your stay in the future.

Summary: I came for the WonderCon event. It was close by. I left my car there and walked to the convention every day. And even Downtown Disney was close :) . I would definitely stay again and it was a very comfy room with Mini Fridge and Microwave
Manager Response: Dear Dc016U,   Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback with TripAdvisor family!  We are happy to hear that your enjoyed our facility.  We are minutes away from the Anaheim Convention Center.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary Heading: Great accommodating Staff and excellent location!
Summary: A Great Experience! From  Mya's warm greetings at reception, to a clean and quiet room, my best experience ever in Anaheim. Thank you all for a stellar stay! Location is a short walk from the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland, but tucked in enough to be tranquil. Will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Z2223PGscotts,  Thank you for choosing Cortona Inn & Suites for your travel needs!  We are happy to hear that our staff was welcoming and accommodating.  Look forward in hosting your stay in the future.  Yours in hospitality,

Summary: If you are looking for a good deal this is it!  Not fancy but very spacious and clean.  The beds are very comfortable.  Bathroom is a bit small and furnishing are slightly dated like older alarm clocks telephone and no docking stations but really a great deal for the price, location is great too!  Would stay here again
Manager Response: Dear E3343JKangelicar,  Thank you for staying with us!  We look forward in hosting your stay once your travels bring you back to the Anaheim Resort Area.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: We have stayed at the hotel in the past and booked it directly for that reason.  Other family members stayed elsewhere, closer to the park.  While covid protocols limited room services we were able to ask for and were promptly provided with whatever we needed.  The room was spacious and comfortable.  We enjoyed the breakfast, free parking, location and even a quiet time in the swimming area.  We didn’t visit Disneyland this time but were able to frequently join our children and grandchildren in their breaks from the park.  We recommend the hotel and will stay there in future visits.
Manager Response: Dear 663judyr, Thank you for your review.  We are happy that you enjoyed our Breakfast, free parking and pool.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Thank you for sharing your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  Yours in hospitality,

Summary: When our original hotel choice for our Disneyland trip fell through weeks before our trip, we had to scramble to choose from what options were left.  The Cortona didn't check all of our boxes but seemed to have overall positive reviews.  As we were traveling with a family member with mobility concerns, we really wanted a hotel with a shuttle to the park entrance but had to settle for the buses at the Toy Story lot across the street which never made us wait.  We had a suite with a king bed in one room and bunk beds in the second room.  The mattress on the king size bed was quite comfortable but my teens said the mattresses on the bunk beds were only fair.  The AC worked very well in the bunk room but not so well in the king room.  The room with the bunks was very spacious but the
Manager Response: Dear STLMom Traveler,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We look forward in hosting your stay in the near future.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Mya helped me out when I first arrived. She is super friendly, outgoing and helpful with any questions I had. Our room was clean and comfy! Great customer service here.  Breakfast was simple, muffin, toast, sausage, pancakes.
Manager Response: Dear nung_sombour,  Thank you for the terrific review and for recognizing our great team for taking care of you. I am glad that you enjoyed the hotel, and on behalf of all of us.  Thank you again for your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel next time you are in Anaheim! Thank you from the entire staff.

Summary: Convenient place to stay..a little dated, our room was very adequate, had everything, dark colors in most of the room...hot shower! Could have used a few more breakfast items, maybe we went too late and it was all gone..we stayed 3 nights, walked to Disney. Overall good stay!

Summary: This was a great place to stay for our Disneyland Vaca!  Walking distance of the parks or we could walk across the street and take the Disney buses.  We had 2 rooms.  Both clean and comfy.  The staff was very friendly and super helpful !  If parking is full valet is available.  We, also, chose this place for simple breakfast options so we could get, eat, and go!  Definitely staying here again :)
Manager Response: Dear TraciAnneN, Thank you for staying with us and choosing our hotel property for your travel needs.  Look forward  in hosting your stay in the near future.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Everything was perfect and clean I have stayed here 2 times and will continue to stay the service was great. The breakfast in the morning is good and very clean great service at all times. I recommend the hotel to all my family
Manager Response: Dear 570gemac,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your experience.  Look forward in hosting your stay in the future.  Best Regards,

Summary: Great place to stay. Close to Disneyland & Art line of you choose not to walk. Nice rooms & helpful staff. Other than that I don’t have anything else to say. We did not partake of the breakfast so no review of that.
Manager Response: Thank you for Choosing Cortona Inn & Suites, we are happy to hear that you enjoy our rooms and service.  Look forward in hosting your stay in the near future.

Summary: Great visit but AC in room sucked waking up our baby at night from how hit the room was and I think the breakfast gave me the stinkiest gas of my life as it was quite mediocre but can't complain too much since it was free.
Manager Response: Dear HyC_Link,  Thank you for staying with us!  I'm sorry to hear about the AC issues in the room.  We will be discussing this issues with our Maintenance team to avoid from happening to our new guest.  Best Regards,

Summary: Cortona was affordable and sufficient accommodations for our 1 night stay in Anaheim. The only downside is parking was a bit sparse. The room was spacious and clean. We would stay again if we needed a room for 1 or 2 nights.

Summary: The Cortona Inn and Suites was perfect for us. The rooms was adequate; the beds very comfortable and the breakfast saved us time and money and was fine.  The workers here were friendly and helpful even helping me print our boarding passes when we left.

Summary: Perfect location and value for our family visit to Disneyland! Great, friendly staff. A special shout out to Maya for being very helpful to our special needs. We did a road trip that included several hotels. This was the best place we stayed. Would recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Bsix,  Thank you for your kind words and for recognizing our staff!  We appreciate your business and look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Best bed in a Anaheim Hotel
Summary: We really enjoyed our stay here. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. The complementary breakfast was simple but did the job to get you going in the morning. The room is spacious and clean. The beds were so comfortable!!! I've never slept in a bed this comfy in any Anaheim Hotel. The only complaint I would say is the card key entry was very fussy. It took many attempts to get it to open the door. And there are not enough outlets for charging devices. And none on the bedside tables. They really need to upgrade that. The walk to Disney Parks was about 20minutes. The price was a great value! We loved this hotel! And will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear Damster67,  Thank you for staying with us!  We look forward in hosting your stay next time you visit Anaheim!  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary Heading: BIG NO TO THIS HOTEL! MISLEADING PICTURES AND REVIEWS!!
Summary: We live in Phoenix and visit Disneyland frequently and have stayed in many Hotels in this area. I picked this one for my 3-night visit because it had helpful reviews and the pictures made the rooms look nice.  I don't know where these reviews are coming from, but they cannot be from verified guests.  Start with check in. Fairly simple as they put a 50.00 deposit on the credit card which right there should have sent a red flag to me, because the rooms are so outdated, there is nothing in there worth $50.00 (including the bedding). When we got up to our room, I was sent back about 30 years ago to when I could only afford the very cheapest motel I could find. The microwave was broken, the refrigerator was at least 20 years old. The phone didn't work to even call down to the desk.
Manager Response: Dear M3444CPlouisel,  First of all, thank you very much for your recent stay at our hotel.  We strive to accommodate all of guests and their needs and I'm disappointed that we did not meet your expectations with regards to your room.   We are sorry for the unusual condition of the room you received.  We take all reviews positive and negative very seriously, and your feedback will help us improve for our next guest or your next visit.  Thank you for staying with us!  We look forward to another opportunity.

Summary: The staff was kind and very upfront about how things operate, the one bed room was still spacious enough for two people and was very clean and organized. There was little to no noise during our stay and even if there was, we were told to call in a complaint immediately to help resolve the situation. Breakfast could have been better but it’s a nice inclusion to the stay. Sergio was at the front desk assisting us with checking in and he was very kind and helpful. It was a nice place to stay for the night and is only a 5 minute drive from the Disneyland park.
Manager Response: Dear 485rubene,  Thank you for choosing us for your recent visit.  We want our guests to experience genuine, attentive, and warm service throughout their stay.  Also, glad to hear you found our location convenient.  Look forward in hosting your stay soon!  Best Regards,

Summary Heading: Professional good service from receptionist MYA
Summary: Nice clean peaceful hotel. With open pool and complimentary breakfast.  One of the most things what I liked - professionalism and friendliness of RECEPTIONIST MYA. I HAD EXTREMELY STRESSFUL DAYS - my baby got open surgery in that day.  My window was locked to open. And I do really needed some fresh air. So, I left a little bit open door. I was SOOO MUCH TIRED that was not able to change the room (with normal working window). I went to sleep after 12am (after hospital) and had to be in the hospital before 8am.  Some employee of the hotel KNOCKED TO MY DOOR AT 4 AM!!!!! Told me that I

Summary: Inexpensive, free parking and breakfast, pool and comfy beds. Place isn’t that updated but it’s clean and staff is nice. Have stayed here several times while going to Disneyland and would recommend if you just need a place to shower and sleep. They have suites for families too
