Summary: The hotel has free valet. You can leave your car there all day while your at Disney. Also has hot breakfast in the morning. The bed and pillows are so comfortable and it's walking distance from the Disneyland parking lot. This was my second time staying here. I high recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Sunands2022, Thank you for staying with us, we appreciate your 5 Star Review.  I'm happy to hear that you are happy with our property and services.  Look forward in hosting your stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay for Disneyland visit
Summary: We loved staying here it is close to Disneyland within walking distance. We also loved that breakfast was served in the mornings you had to go early if you didn’t want to have them run out of food. Room was pretty clean. We stayed for a week and we just asked for room service for one day and they were happy to do that. I would stay here again I thought their customer service was excellent and for the price it was a great find.
Manager Response: Dear 59Trace63,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay experience with us.  We are happy you enjoyed all the hotel has to offer.  Thank you again and we look forward to your return in the not so distant future.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Great location for a Disneyland visit!
Summary: Great location and close to Disneyland, about a half hour walk which was perfect for two adults. It was also accessible to many freeways to get to other parts of Southern California, which was ideal for us on non Disney days.  The rooms aren't super fancy but suitable for what we needed. It was great that parking was included, as was breakfast, though the selection on breakfast was repetitive so we skipped it a few mornings. At times it was noisy from other guests in the hotel, so improved soundproofing would be nice. Overall I would recommend this hotel for the value and location.
Manager Response: Dear 600bekkir,  Thanks for sharing your valuable feedback with regards to our hotel.  Cortona Inn & Suites always located in the convenience place, as like the Convention Center, bus stop, Disneyland, and freeways.  We look forward to your next trip!  Sincerely,

Summary: The rest of the family stayed at the Clarion next door… had to PAY more, PAY for breakfast, had smaller beds and room. We were in a first floor room at the Cortona, with comfy beds, pillows, comforters, microwave and large mini fridge. Across the street was the $6 a day bus to Disney (kids and 65+ are $2.50)40@. Breakfast was egg and sausage one day, potatoes and hard boiled eggs the next. Cereal was flakes, Cheerios and fruit loops. Toast, fruit and yogurt too. All hotels that are walking distance yo Disneyland are expensive. This seemed comparably reasonable. Convenience stores nearby for pizza and hotdog dinner! Ha!
Manager Response: Dear Jodie D,  Thank you for being our guest and for writing such a gracious review. We are delighted that our inspired service and surroundings exceeded your expectations and that you particularly loved our location. We hope that this enriching experience will bring you and your family back to enjoy more of what we have to offer. Thank you again for choosing the Cortona Inn & Suites, Anaheim Resort.

Summary: We came in December 2021, and really enjoyed staying here. Great for the price. Clean room, friendly staff and a warm pool that stays open until 10:00 PM. Located conveniently close to Disney. We Ubered for about $15. My family would definitely stay here again, only complaint is the room was pretty humid the entire time.
Manager Response: Dear sequoyahs2021.  Thank you for being our guest and for writing such a gracious review. We are delighted that our inspired service and surroundings exceeded your expectations and that you particularly loved our swimming pool, and relaxing spa. We hope that this enriching experience will bring you and your family back to enjoy more of what we have to offer. Thank you again for choosing the Cortona Inn & Suites, Anaheim Resort.

Summary: The Cortona Inn was a perfectly fine place to stay for a Disney trip. The room was fairly spacious though you can tell it is a bit older with the carpets and fixtures being pretty dated. That said, it was very clean when we checked in. The wifi works and there is digital TV so at least those features are modern. Microwave and refrigerator in every room and they worked great! Pull out sofa bed was surprisingly comfortable though the sheets are a bit thin. The sheets on the main bed seem better. It was pretty quiet in the room but you can hear stuff going on outside because the room doors are exterior-facing. Be aware the doors face out into the parking areas like a Motel and they are not interior doors in a hallway like a Hotel. This was a surprise to me since it is not marketed
Manager Response: Dear Melrodg,  Thank you so much for the review and sharing your feedback with other on TripAdvisor!  We look forward in welcoming you back to our hotel next time you are in  Anaheim!    Yours in hospitality,

Summary: we spent 4 nights there, Thursday (Thanksgiving)- Sunday  15 mins walk from Disneyland park.  cost effective if you want to just get to sleep after 12+ hours in the park. breakfast is included: hard boiled eggs, roasted potatoes, two selections of cereal (frootloops and raisin bran) milk, coffee, hot chocolate tea, all toast you can eat bananas apples and oranges. parking is free  cleanness:89/100 convenience:95/100   deep carpet cleaning or changing carpet to hard flooring would be a good improvement.
Manager Response: Dear M6123Nlaldos,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. The feedback we receive from our valued guest, like you enables us to target problem areas.  We value you as our guest and hope you will continue to choose Cortona Inn & Suites for your future travel needs.

Summary: This hotel is nothing special but it had comfortable beds and wasn’t too far from Disneyland. We had 5 in our suite and all slept well. The bathroom door wouldn’t close right, the breakfast was minimal and not good, but what can you expect as most of the other hotels nearby are pricier.
Manager Response: Dear X5082KFlisac,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback.  We're glad you enjoyed our great location in Anaheim.  We look forward in hosting your stay in the future.

Summary: We’ve been trying different hotels around Disneyland for the last few months and going  every couple of weeks. This was our first time at the Cortana and for what we were expecting we got a lot more than that. Great price and a super clean room! Cheapest hotel that we stayed at in and around Disneyland by far, we will stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear mrmadmax4200,  Thank you for your loyalty towards our hotel, and for sharing about your stay at Cortona Inn & Suites, Anaheim Resort. Summary: When we go to Disneyland the Cortona is our favorite place to stay! Fantastic staff who really seem to care for the guests and take pride in their jobs, clean rooms, and a great location to commute to and from the parks. 100% would recommend!
Manager Response: Dear AlyssaUL90, Thank you for your loyalty towards our hotel, and for sharing about your stay at Cortona Inn & Suites, Anaheim Resort. Summary: We enjoyed our stay. The room was clean. Staff was very helpful and friendly. Appreciated the security guard walking around the parking lot at night making sure our cars were safe. My husband loved the pool and hot tub. We walked the mile to Disneyland every morning, it didn't seem far since we walk for exercise. At night we caught the Toy Story parking lot bus since Toy Story parking lot was across from our Hotel. It wasn't a far walk to Harbor Blvd. from there. Would definitely stay here again. IHOP was across the street a little. Starbuck's at Hyatt Place next door.
Manager Response: Dear B8431VJlorrainea, Thank you for being our guest and for writing such a gracious review.  We are delighted that our inspired service and surroundings exceeded your expectations and that you particularly loved our swimming pool, and relaxing spa.  Thank you again for choosing the Cortona inn & Suites, Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Checked in with a young man named Cruz who was very friendly as well as helpful! The room was clean. Also liked that you can text the front desk if you need towels and such. When we asked they came quickly and delivered our towels.
Manager Response: Dear Bmolina212, Thank you for the terrific review and for recognizing our great team for taking care of you.  I am glad that you enjoyed the hotel, and on behalf of all of us.  Thank you again for your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary: Very nice hotel for the price. Love how everything was super clean and very close to everything especially Disneyland. Definitely would stay again. Love the free breakfast as well, also love how the parking is secured.
Manager Response: DearN3692NJrosieg, I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you for the terrific review I am glad that you enjoyed the hotel,  and on behalf of all of us, Thank you again.

Summary: Very clean room, very quiet hotel, beds were exceptionally comfortable, breakfast included was lackluster with only cereal, toast, fruit and coffee/ juice, nothing hot and no yogurt or pastry. Parking was cramped and difficult to get a spot near our room but we were able to leave it there during our 2 days at Disney and used public transportation to get to the park but easily walkable from the hotel. A great stay at a reasonable price. We will stay again for our next trip.
Manager Response: Dear Patti M. Thank you for staying with us and writing a review about our property. We strive to give great and impressive service to all our guests. It makes us happy to read we have met your expectations and that our location, room cleanliness, and breakfast were suitable to your needs.  We look forward in hosting your stay once your travels bring you back to our beautiful City.

Summary: All good, good room as always, good breakfast  and great gift shop.  But, except shower curtain in room 216 at Cortona Inns n Suites, S. Harbor was bad.  It leaked water from shower on to floor twice. I slipped and fell and hurt my left elbow when I stepped on the soaked bath mat on floor next to tub-shower.  Was like stepping on slippery ice!!   I told management about it on 10/29/21.  This happened morning of 10/27/21.
Manager Response: Dear Q3867WXrichardp, We are thankful and very much appreciative that you have taken the time to post about your recent stay at our property.   We will follow up with our head department to take action on this shower.  I apologies for the inconvenience of having water in the bathroom. Thank you so much for bringing this to our attention.  We Look forward in hosting your stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Only hotel near Disneyland with free parking!
Summary: We only got to stay 4 days and 3 nights, but couldn’t have asked for a better stay! Great distance from Disneyland, we walked there in the mornings and took Ubers back to the hotel at night they never went over $12, better than paying $25 per day at the park. One night we couldn’t find parking and the Valet parking ended up helping us out with no extra charge. Breakfast was the only issue, but it’s understandable with Covid ongoing. The receptionist were amazing at all hours of the day!!
Manager Response: Dear jessicatY9042BU,  Thank you for choosing Cortona Inn & Suites Anaheim Resort for your recent visit.  Thank you for your comments I will share this with the agents.  We want our guest to experience genuine, attentive, and warm service throughout their stay and seems that we exceeded your expectations.  In regards to our breakfast options we are working hard in bringing more options.  Due to the Pandemic a lot of the items are being back order by our suppliers.  Thank you for your understanding.  Look forward in hosting your stay once again!  Best Regards,

Summary: Very nice hotel; would stay here again! Room, including beds, was very comfortable. There were 4 kids in our group and we all enjoyed having them in a separate room (1 bunk set and a sofa sleeper)!  Parking was free, pool was great ~ kids swam and swam! The Toy Story parking lot is diagonal across the street for shuttle to DLand = easy peasy! The only con for this hotel was the breakfast  :( There were 2 cold cereals, oatmeal, apples or oranges, toast, hard boiled eggs (terrible) and 2 juice choices. Not impressed at all.  We realize Covid has changed a lot of things; it’s too bad hotels have let it affect their breakfast. We needed a good, healthy start for a big day at Disneyland. We would still stay at The Cortona in the future, but plan extra food to add for breakfast.
Manager Response: 152pamelab,  Thank you for choosing our hotel and for your comments.  We greatly appreciate your feedback and take each one of your concerns to heart.  We are reviewing our food options for our breakfast bar and making changes moving forward due to the Pandemic a lot of our Vendors have items on back order.  Thank you for your patience and understanding .  We look forward in hosting your stay once your travels bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Best Regards,

Summary: This place was absolutely amazing with the absolute best customer service. The girls in the office were really nice to us. When we arrived, we realized that we was not going to be able to share a room with our 3 teenagers and asked to rent a bigger room or an additional room.  We ended up renting another room and they helped us get the best rate and then the young man that checked us out of our rooms was really nice as well. It was super clean and had no issue supplying us with what we needed ( toilet paper, towels, garbage bags) in our rooms!! I strongly suggest Cortona suites and resorts!!
Manager Response: Dear 492kateu,  Thank you for choosing Cortona Inn & Suites for your recent stay and for sharing your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to Anaheim.  Best Regards,

Summary Heading: Father away, but same walk time as much closer hotels b/c Toy Story lot.
Summary: This is only our second stay near Disneyland in a hotel. I did review that hotel also. The following topics are what I was really wanting to know before I went, but it didn't seem like most other reviews really get to the bottom line. I was looking for the best value. I thought was a little better than the other hotel in a few ways, but this was almost 40$ cheaper per night. The bed was a little less firm than the other hotel, which was the best thing about it. The distance to the toy story lot was not horrible, but it seemed to be just as long as our walk from the Garden walk area to Disney as it was to actually get from the Cortana across the lot to the shuttle buses. I did not measure the steps, but I am fairly confident in my assessment.  The bathroom was much bigger than

Summary: Easy check in/out. Loved everything about it. Just the parking was a little hard but then I figured out valet parking so we were good. Breakfast was ok I guess. Expected more but it was worth what I paid

Summary Heading: Great place for a trip to DisneyLand
Summary: We stayed at the Junior Suite because I knew my daughter has always wanted to try a bunk bed. She loved it. The beds were comfortable. The location was perfect. The people are really great for service. I must say that the people were great.   Now the negatives: 1. I know its downtown, but parking is expensive. 2. The front door had a pretty big crack at the bottom. 3. The toilet was…extremely low flow. As in you have to hold the lever and hold it.   So all in all - good place for what its purpose is. I do wish they had a more upgraded bathroom.
Manager Response: Dear AlexKac,  Thank you for choosing our hotel and for your comments.  We sincerely apologize that we were not able to strive an enriching and meaningful stay.  I will share your feedback with our Maintenance team to improve our ground floors and restroom design.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to our beautiful city.

Summary: The location was very convenient for adventuring the nearby theme parks, the service we received at the front desk was top tier. The rooms were clean,cozy and homey with excellent room service. 10/10 would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear EvaMVincent,  Thank you for being our guest and for writing such a gracious review.  We are delighted that our inspired service and surroundings exceeded your expectations.  We look forward in hosting your stay in the near future.

Summary Heading: perfect for a family with kids on a budget!
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Cortona Inn! The kids suite was great because it allowed the teenagers and parents to have some privacy without having to get multiple rooms. The rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable. The kids loved the bunk beds. The pool area was clean and during the week was relatively uncrowded. It's an easy walking distance to Disneyland (about 12 minutes) and the myriad food and store options nearby. The staff was polite and helpful. It was nice to have a to go breakfast option available. The AC in the room worked great. The only small downside was that in our room, on the third floor by the stairs, heard every single drag of suitcase wheels, shouts of passersby (thankful the AC was also enough white noise to mostly drown out regular conversational
Manager Response: Dear 596lauric,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay experience with us. We are happy you enjoyed all the hotel has to offer. Thank you again and we look forward to your return in the not so distant future.

Summary: Great service, just not a breakfast I was waiting on but is understandable because of COVID , great pool service, great environment , clean, security everything great. Great view, employees were nice.
Manager Response: Dear 464yeseniah,  Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Good clean room for family vacation
Summary: The rooms were clean and everything from the refrigerator to the air conditioner worked well. They advertise hot breakfast but because of pandemic they gave a bag of yogurt, muffin and fresh fruit. Great nightly rate and really close to Disneyland and lots of restraunts within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear christinacA3638VY,  I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you from the entire staff.

Summary Heading: Unsanitary and the rooms are not as described.
Summary: When we entered our first room there was a pile of hair in the corner of the first section of the bathroom and stains on the floor. The second section had hairs scattered all over and more spots. The front desk refused to refund us stating that they do not give refunds after the room has been paid for. They instead “upgraded” us to a two room “Spa Suite” and asked housekeeping to double check to make sure there were no hairs in the bathroom. There was still hair including a pubic hair on the floor towel. The manager sent someone over who took a towel and wiped away the hair and removed the pubic hair leaving the towel!   The rooms are not upgraded and recently remodeled like they state. They are not practicing additional protocols for cleaning following the CDC and WHO and I

Stayed with our 5 year old, felt comfortable with variety of families staying as well. Walkable to Disney, restaurants and pharmacies. Pool and hot tub nice and functional. Togo breakfast was simple but perfect for a quick bite before the day. Could use some upgrades to the bathroom, windows.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel and for your comments.  We greatly appreciate your feedback and take each one of your concerns to heart.  We hope that this enriching experience will bring you and your family back to enjoy more of what we have to offer.  Thank you again for choosing the Cortona Inn & Sites, Anaheim Resort.

Summary: The room and customer service was subpar from the beginning. The room I was given didn't have a working fan in the bathroom, the in room coffee machine was broken, had paper thin walls, and noisy pipes that woke me up multiple times.   To top it off, on the morning of our departure, a poor man fell and received a massive head wound outside my door, leaving copious amounts of blood on the floors and walls leading from one corner of the building to the other. Obviously this is not something one can control, but the fact that they waited 2.5 hours to respond was appalling. Nothing was done close off the area or clean the blood by hotel staff until is was nearly dry. This man could have had blood born pathogens and all the guests and their children on the bottom floor were exposed

We welcome any opportunity to improve.  I would be more than happy to assist if you would like to speak with me directly. I can be reach at 714-971-5000.

Summary: Nice and clean! Perfect for a family going to Disneyland! The hotel staff was friendly and nice! The hotel itself was clean and quiet! Would definitely recommend! Once the toy story parking reopens you could walk right across and grab a bus to Disneyland!

Summary: Don't ruin your Disney trip by staying here.  We hardly got any sleep, here's why: Right when we walked into our ugly, old room it had this horrible musty-mildew smell. I should've went with my gut and asked for a different room but the kids were tired and wanting to settle and the husband thought I'd sound like "Karen" for complaining. We figured we'd just get used to the smell and it wouldn't notice anymore so, I didn't complain or change rooms. We were on the bottom floor right by the ice maker so with these thin walls, and thin window (with no screen so we couldn't air out the smell), you could hear every person walk by, every car in the parking lot, and every hock of a loogie.  At this point, I wanted to find a different place to stay but the baby was asleep so we were

Summary: This hotel charges a "resort" fee of $16, but it was no resort. All it had was a parking lot, rooms, and a swimming pool. Parking was included in that fee, but at times it was difficult to find a spot. This is a motel (room doors open to the outside). I stayed two nights and three days and my room was never cleaned. I don't think they even went inside - towels were left on floor, bath mat was sopping wet, trash not emptied, bed was not made.   The room did not have enough electrical outlets. I could not plug in both my CPAP machine and my phone near the bed. I like to have the phone nearby for safety but I had to plug it in across the room. I had to move the desk away from the wall to get to another outlet and unplug either the coffee pot or the lamp in order to plug in my

Summary Heading: Good hotel if going to Disneyland
Summary: Very close to Disneyland,  good price, walking distance to Disneyland. Beds were comfortable, free continental breakfast, the coffee in the room is not too good, small bathrooms, otherwise we had a good stay, just spent one night because going to universal studios early morning.

My mom and I planned to go to Disney and chose this hotel for its closeness and free parking that was available. We never made it to Disney due to the rain and what not going on... we ordered a firestick from Amazon Prime Now and Had it delivered to the room so we could watch movies. The tv/cable provider wouldn’t have been fun for girls night. Beds were comfy but the walls are thin so some people stood outside our door talking and I couldn’t hear the TV as clear as I could hear them. Overall good for the price 🤷🏼‍♀️🤷🏼‍♀️

Summary: The hotel itself is older. Meeds more updating than what is obvious to see the ownership has tried. Paint and flat screen TVs can’t cover up the true age that shows through. The hot tub was broken during our stay and the details stated it has a heated pool. It doesn’t. Parking is a nightmare. Walking distance to Disneyland is 15 minutes. There are lots of places to eat and a couple pharmacies nearby which are nice to have close. Bottom line, if you want somewhere cheap to stay that’s OK and you only plan on being in your room to shower and sleep, this is a good choice. Other than that, including relaxing by the pool, go

The breakfast was better last time we stayed here. There were some hot options, but it lacked muffins or danishes (which disappointed my kids) and was a little lackluster. The staff was helpful and friendly, and were able to accommodate us a little early, with our request for the top floor. There were lots of pillows, but they were very firm and fluffy. The hot tub was out of order, but the pool was heated enough for our kids to swim. (in early March) There were a few corners that needed a little scrubbing, and the hot/cold water in the bath was randomly backwards, but otherwise no real complaints, and we would definitely

Git to our room kids were excited for Bunkbeds🤦🏻‍♀️ We had a minor maintenance issue told the front desk and they were on it right away!! The staff were absolutely lovely, and the breakfast wasn't bad at all! One day was sausage patties, corn chowder, and eggs, which was an odd selection lol but that might just be me being picky. And there were always yummy cereals and other toastables in case my picky tastes got in the way lol. And the fresh fruit and yogurt was a nice touch :)  The distance from NAMM was absolutely perfect!!! We were close enough to walk but far enough away to not be loud

Manager Response: Dear EsmieMaria,  Thank you for being our guest and for writing such a gracious review. We are delighted that our inspired service and surroundings exceeded your expectations.  We hope that this enriching experience will bring you and your family back to enjoy more of what we have to offer. Thank you again for choosing the Cortona Inn & Suites, Anaheim Resort.

Summary: This place does it duty of providing a room to sleep after a long day at disney parks. also it location like 2 mins away from the shuttle to the park. also if you get an uber at night it only cost $7.
Manager Response: Dear 429alinah,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review and sharing your feedback with others on TripAdvisor! We greatly appreciate your comments and can’t express to you our gratitude for your kind words about our hotel and our colleagues. I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary: This humble little hotel is surrounded by a bunch of monster hotels so, you not think much of it, but don’t judge a book by its cover...this place was great! Super clean (rooms, pool/hot tub and grounds all spic and span), close to Disneyland and the price per night is more than reasonable. We will stay here again and recommend to anyone looking for a place in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Cortona Inn - great place and great bargain!!
Summary: The rooms  are very nice and great location.  Staff is very accommodating and friendly.  Price is a real value for being so close to Disney.  Very  reasonable gift shop too (and good selection).  The free continental breakfast is a great asset as well
Manager Response: Dear Catherine W,  Thanks for sharing your valuable feedback with regards to our hotel.  Cortona Inn & Suites always located in the convenience place, as like near the bus stop, Anaheim Convention Center and a few minutes from Disneyland Park. We hope our customers can feel more relaxed no matter they are on work or in travel.  We look forward to your next trip!  Sincerely,

Summary: Decent hotel, I like that it had a separate room for the kids, not the fanciest thing but good enough for what we needed, low cost and very close to Disney. I do think breakfast needs to be extended to later than 9:30am
Manager Response: Dear Concheetah15,  Thank you for staying with us here at the Cortona Inn & Suites hotel and for sharing your valued feedback. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments on our location.  Your comments regarding breakfast operating hours will be shared with our Management team so we can continue to improve moving forward. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the Cortona Inn & Suites hotel in the near future.  Best Regards,

Summary: The room was clean. Needs sound-proofing. It was very noisy near the stairs. It was like the door and window were wide open. Needs new weather stripping around the door, huge gap. Breakfast was hit or miss.

We were in Anaheim for a 3 generation Disney vacation. We loved the location and the ease of transportation using the ART bus system. The breakfast had much to choose from and was replenished constantly. There were always several protein options. The housekeeping staff was friendly and prompt. When we arrived we had what looked like a bloodstain on our comforter. It was changed out immediately after I called. The rooms seemed very clean other than that.  We were less than impressed by the customer service skills of the front desk staff. They answered all of our questions with short, almost rude attitudes, For example while we were using the pool, the gate malfunctioned locking most of our family in the pool area. My 17-year old was outside the gate and after we tried to unlock

We really enjoyed our stay at Cortona. The room was big, the bed really comfortable, it included a bath tub (this is a plus), a microwave and a mini fridge, wich made our stay really enjoyable. It's also in a walking distance from Disneyland and restaurants (less tan 30 minutes). It also includes a continental breakfast, wich included cereal, waffles, coffee, tea, etc.. I would definitely come back
Manager Response: Dear Angelina I,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review and sharing your feedback with others on TripAdvisor! We greatly appreciate your comments and can’t express to you our gratitude for your kind words about our hotel. I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!   Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: The facility is a little older, but it was clean and well maintained. The staff was pleasant, and the breakfast was great. It's convenient to Disneyland for older families or strollers. Might be a little long for younger kids with shorter legs.

The staff is super friendly and welcoming. The room was something to endure. First thing that hits you is the smell. I turned off one of the two air units, that emitted the worse smell. I used air spray daily to get by. You'll hear everything, outside, and from those above you thru the floor clearly. I bought ear plugs. You wouldn't want to walk on the carpet without socks, ever. It felt nasty, constantly damp even. After 4 nights my "room socks" were so filthy I contemplated just throwing them out. The entry window didn't lock, there was a bottom screw-on lock to keep people out. The window could still open on a slant despite that, but not wide enough to get a hand in, so I just kept the blinds closed and prayed for the best. I needed to be walking distance to the convention

The hotel was a normal hotel, nothing absolutely fantastic about it. The staff were very friendly, helpful, and patient. You could tell they really loved their jobs.  The breakfast did not have a lot of options, no bacon while I was there.  I appreciated how quiet my room was. I couldn't hear my neighbors or the street noise. Great walking distance to the convention center.  All in all, I would say this is an average hotel.

Summary Heading: Simple hotel close to convention center
Summary: I selected this hotel because it was close to convention center. Similar to many Best Westerns. Good bed, clean room. Parking easy until last night when hotel was full. Had to park in underground lot. Drawers would not stay closed in dresser and bedside table. Hard to get to plugs. Breakfast was pretty basic. Staff was wonderful. Likely good for families. I had asked for a room in low floor and near elevator. I was put on third floor and half way between two elevators. I use a walker and it was more walking.

Room was very clean and spacious. Breakfast was delicious and they were very generous when it came to breakfast. Staff was friendly and kind would definitely stay again. Coffee was served all day, the down side of it, is you need to pay for parking, no pets allowed and shuttle to Disneyland is not included with hotel its an extra charge. But Disneyland is only a 20 min walk. Hotel is 6-8 min drive to Shakeys pizza and Don Churros.
Manager Response: Dear Youuuutfdres,  I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you for the terrific review and for recognizing our great team for taking care of you. I am glad that you enjoyed the hotel, and on behalf of all of us, Thank you again for your review. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel next time you are in Anaheim! Thank you from the entire staff.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: The hotel was great for the location and the price I paid. The staff were very friendly. The only reason why I am not rating this 5 stars because the carpet was dirty, the beds made noise as you make slight movements, and the room was hot despite the air conditioning being on. The location was fantastic and the hotel as a whole was A+.

I enjoyed my stay at Cortona Inn. The hotel is close to the Anaheim convention center and within walking distance of Disneyland, and some convenience stores and places to eat at. The hotel staff was always friendly and helpful and the rooms were clean and air temperature easily adjusted.   I only wish the hotel breakfast had some more healthy options (lactose free milk or other milk alternatives, and more food options without wheat or grains), but the staff in the breakfast area was lovely. Kudos to the gentleman Enríque who was really helpful answering my questions as I had never been to the States before.  Thanks!

Fantastic deal for the price. Includes free parking and breakfast. Great location, ART bus nearby. Clean rooms. Only thing I'd suggest is more places to change electronics. Only available outlet was near the sink.

Summary Heading: Great location to convention center and Disney
Summary: A little dated but the service was fantastic. We enjoyed the buffet breakfast. The area is pricey as is most tourist places. Avoid nearby Ihop and Denny's. The housekeeping staff work their tails off to make the older hotel clean as can be.

We love this hotel! Everyone is so welcoming. The beds are SO comfy!! I always get a great night's sleep here. So many comfy pillows and blankets to cuddle up in. About a 15 min walk to Disney you less you utilize ART which we do when we're tired. We'll be back!!

We had a great time and loved our hotwl.. the microwave and coffee pot didnt work but we spent our time eating out so it wasnt a inconvenience.. will be stating again in January. I know our stay will be as pleasant as the first

We found this place about 4 years ago and always stay here when we're going to Disneyland for a couple days.  It's always pretty affordable, clean & quiet. The staff is always friendly and efficient.  It's perfect for my family!  Thank you

Summary Heading: Outdated, spa suit room was underwhelming and the tub was broken
Summary: This is definitely a budget hotel and we won't be staying here again. When booking online, we decided to upgrade to the king spa suite so we could take advantage of the jacuzzi tub. The images on their site made the suite look cozy, bright and welcoming. Unfortunately that wasn't the case when we checked in to our room after a long day of flying.   First of all they put us on the 1st floor which is noisy. You can hear kids running around and people slamming doors at all hours of the night. Second, when we walked into our room for the first time it smelt damp, it was really dark, and it looked horribly outdated. The sheets on the bed were rough to the touch and the pillows were so cheap- hard foam and overstuffed. We went to check out the jacuzzi tub that we had paid extra for

Walking distance to Disney and downtown Disney. If you don’t feel like walking there is the toy story parking with free shuttle across the street. Cvs and Walgreens a block away as well as various places that deliver food to your toom

Very nice hotel!! Staff is super nice. The breakfast was  disappointing though. Not enough seating and food seemed undercooked. Only 1 toaster and it took 3 go arounds to get waffles done. Also need more washers and dryers. 2 of each is not enough. Other than those 2 things, it was very nice.

Do not stay here. We arrived after a day at Disney and had to immediately leave because the bathroom was filled with bugs. Flying insects with tiny flying insects walking in rows along the bathroom floor and walls. Maintenance guy said it was termites, which means infestation in the building. The girl at the front counter was nice and tried to help but the hotel was booked at capacity so we had to make the drive home. So anyway, don’t stay here unless you’re into bugs.

We had a great stay here. Rooms had lots of space and were clean and comfortable. Location is perfect if you're going to Disney, we walked. Our room was located right by the elevator and stairs but we didnt hear too much noise. Breakfast was simple yet satisfying. The only feedback I'll leave is that it would be nice to have a hook/towel rack closer to the shower in the huge bathroom.

- The rooms were very nice and immaculately clean.  The lady cleaning my room, Hilda did a fantastic job.  The bed was hands down, the most comfortable bed I have EVER slept in, while travelling.   - The staff were friendly, and very helpful.  I was waiting for a package to arrive while I was at a conference.  The front desk staff were great and gave me a call as soon as it arrived, so that I could go back to the hotel to pick it up - Breakfast was not elaborate, however, there were eggs, sausage and hash browns, which were good.  They also had cereal, yogurt and the usual continental breakfast items - The location was excellent, as it was an easy walk to the Convention Center and Disneyland,  - The next time I go to Anaheim, I will definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: Nice stay... could use a little renovating...
Summary: The hotel was nice and the check-in and check-out were quick and easy. The location was convenient to Disneyland.  I appreciated the attendants helping with printing out my tickets. The grounds were neat but the rooms were outdated. It could use some brighter lights.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Rooms were large and clean. Staff was great. Breakfast buffet was tasty! Location was perfect as we were visiting Disneyland parks. I would definitely stay at again if we go back to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great location and good deal for the price.
Summary: Our room was clean and check in was easy. Breakfast was just OK but punctual and the room was clean. The only negative was the parking. The spaces were narrow and we had to wait for one to open up. Good value for the $$.

Spa room!!! Having a jacuzzi tub in the room that is big enough for two is the best especially after walking around for 12 plus hrs. The cabel is lame and the power outlets not in a good place. Parking is lame. Not a far walk from the park or toy story parking lot

Our key wouldn’t work at midnight so my son checked the window and it was OPEN!  That’s how we got in and thankfully no other people came in that way while we were away!  Not a good feeling knowing we slept with it unlocked a few nights!

Summary Heading: Good location, great price, nice hotel
Summary: My husband and i looked online for someplace walking distance to Disneyland. We wanted something not too expensive, clean and comfortable. The Cortana Inn fit our wants perfectly! We were so happy when we arrived and saw the hotel and our room. The hotel is not huge, the rooms all open up to the outside like a motel, our room was very clean and the beds so comfortable. We had a bottom floor room, easy access to our car(free parking) and to the hotel lobby where we had free breakfast every day. The breakfasts had alot to chose from, hot and cold foods. The swimming looked nice, we didn't use it, but there were usually kids enjoying it. Laundry room on site, a little expensive, $3 to wash, $3 to dry. The walk to Disneyland wasn't too bad, we are fast walkers and it took us about

We stayed there to be close to Disneyland. They were nice, their little shop was nice, rooms were clean, and big enough for my family of 6. Definitely would stay there again. We stayed at a bigger more expensive hotel last time and we actually disliked it. Loved it here

Hotel is conveniently located across from the Toy Story parking lot, where they have free shuttles to the parks. Room was clean and quiet, with comfy beds. Price included breakfast and free parking, which most hotels in the area don’t offer. The hotel also let us leave our car in the parking lot for a few hours after checkout with no additional charge.   Unfortunately our room didn’t get serviced/cleaned after our first night’s stay, even though we took the Don’t Disturb sign off the door. I called the front desk and was told to walk to the lobby myself (at night) to fetch clean towels. I would have preferred if someone offered to bring them up to me, along with the other amenities we needed. Also, new pillows are a must!! The beds were comfy but the pillows definitely weren’t.

Summary Heading: Good hotel about 15 mins walk from Disney
Summary: This hotel was clean, quiet, & not too far from Disney. You can Uber to Disney if you don’t want to walk 15 mins which would be about 6-9 dollars. The hotel The employees were nice! The is free breakfast as well!

This was the perfect last minute booking of a hotel I have ever done! Booked the room exactly 1 week before my stay and the price was most reasonable and in our budget. Staff was very friendly. Only confusing part is that it shares property with another hotel, so I was a little lost with the parking. Oh... if you are a guest of the hotel parking is free! That was a plus in my book, most hotels in the Anaheim area charge for parking now. I will stay here again.

It was good, clean, friendly staff and very helpful. Close to the toy story bus line for Disneyland. Breakfast was decent and beds were comfy. There was a pool and hot tub. Close to stores and restaurants. There’s fridges and microwaves as well

Summary Heading: Loved the bunk bed room for the kids
Summary: Loved the bunk bed room. Room was clean. Wished the gift shop was open more. The food was ok for breakfast. The kids were able to have their own space which is really good for our teenagers. The tickets to Disneyland were great!

Plenty of room in our 2 gueen bed room the room has an odd smell when we got there only used one bed might be time for new mattresses remote for TV needed to be changed with a little creativity we got it to work. There was only 1 plug in room  with a family of 4 only 2 can change devises  at a time. Breakfast was plenty each day. It would have been safer in the stair cases if the lights would have worked at 6:30am when we came down for breakfast and at might when we got in to 3rd floor. We used the ART bus line to get to Disneyland that was great or its about a mile walk to Disney from Hotel.

Very short walk to the Anaheim Convention Center and Anaheim Marriott Conference space. Less expensive than other options. Parking ($22/day) and breakfast were included in my reservation. Breakfast is buffet style with a number of choices, more substantial than a continental breakfast.   Room location was dark with one window looking out into a hallway. Noisy equipment ran all night, though I was able to sleep through most of it. I might stay here again, but was not Wowed by the experience.   Front desk staff are very friendly, competent and quick.   Many of the other guests are here for the Disneyland experience!
Manager Response: Dear lovewarmwater,  Thank you for staying with us!  We appreciate your business and look forward to another opportunity in the future.  Yours in Hospitality

Summary: Check in was quick and easy all I had to do was have my I.D and card that I had used to book ahead of time with me. The service was good and the breakfast was hot and ready early. Everything overall went smoothly.

We all loved our stay. From check in to check out you all made our trip very memorable. The room was super comfy. The breakfast was awesome. Even our little one was super happy. Thank you for the enjoyable stay! We high recommend and we will stay here again.

Very clean hotel, and great location to Disney! We walked! Great customer services as well - the front desk was really helpful in purchasing our Disney tickets and giving us recommendations. Would stay here again if we were going to Disney.

Summary Heading: A 1970's dive hiding in the 21st Century
Summary: I ended up staying there, against my better judgement, due to family staying there.  It is a 1970's dive motel, with a paint job.  Not sure how or why they were full, but they seem to stay in business.  The title says it all.  They are not equipped for the 21st century.  All outlets are taken by the various appliances/lamps.  There are no outlets to charge devices or plug in laptops.  With a minimum of 2 queen beds, that could be a minimum of 4 devices.  No way can you charge 4 devices after a day at the resorts.  There are other hotels in the area that are comparable and with more bang for the buck.  I am not sure who chooses to paint the railings without putting up a wet paint sign,which they did in the mid-evening well after the sun went down.  Why paint then?  Sunday

Summary Heading: Clean and close to Disneyland at good price.
Summary: We stayed on a weekday for Disneyland recommended by friends.  Arrived at midnight.   Room when eventually got in was nice.   There was an issue with the door locks that took two trips back to the nice man at the front desk who was dealing with another customer having a similar problem.  Parking was ample even at night but you had to keep the ticket and they covered the fee.  The included breakfast looked decent but we didn't stay as there was nowhere to sit.   There was a store in the lobby having anything your might need or forgotten for a long day at the theme park.   We really appreciated that.  Would go back.

Thank you Cortona Inn and especially NATHAN. I purchased a room at night for a homeless couple that needed shelter and to be able to rest, recover (injured), and shower. I called almost 10 other hotels off/near Katella. ALL of them said no. Most said no only after finding out it was for a homeless couple. I was heartbroken and felt horrible. I called Cortona as my last effort and they didn't cause any hassle or question it. Booking and check-in was easy and they were so nice!!!   Seriously I cannot thank them enough. AMAZING staff and seriously thank you. Even had breakfeast!

Overall, we actually had a very good stay at Cortona. The room was spacious, the AC worked well, and the beds were comfortable. It’s also located about a 20 minute walk from the Park, so it was very convenient for our 3 days at Disney. The staff is also very friendly.  The only two complaints we had were that the room had a very musty/damp smell to it the whole stay, and the walls do not keep out any noise. If you have the AC running, you don’t really notice it, but when it’s off, you hear every step, yell from the pool, or argument.  To be fair, we did not notify the staff about the smell in the room, as we were only there at night. Despite the above, it is a decent option for the price, and we will definitely consider staying here again in the future!
Manager Response: Dear PirandelloK,  Thank you for staying with us here at the Cortona Inn & Suites hotel and for sharing your valued feedback. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments on our location.  We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the Cortona Inn & Suites hotel in the near future.  Best Regards,

Summary: Plenty of room for our family of 6 who mainly needed a place to sleep since we were at Disney all day.  We didn't have soap replenished, and had to use a small round bar that was from the sink on our last day as they took all of our soap from the shower.  Our room was by the ice machine and stairway so every time someone got ice or headed up the stairs, it was very loud.  Other than that, beds were comfortable and rooms were good enough.  We walked to Disney from the hotel, and it was about a 20 minute walk.

Aging accommodation but clean and tidy. Shower a challenge, the ones over a bath with curtain. I found beds very comfortable. Has coffee percolator but no kettle for tea, one is provided on request. No tea or milk supplied. No cutlery or plates provided , but has microwave. Only polystyrene cups. Buffet breakfast basic with only polystyrene cups again and bowls and plastic cutlery. Great swimming pool and spa pool. Nice, friendly and accomodating staff.

Breakfast was allot better than my coworkers who were staying in a more expensive hotel. They had no eggs.  Only negative items, were next opening door, which was so loud they were coming in my room. Second item, check out at 11AM, was told I could leave car in parking lot the whole day, was not told about the $11 fee, that the parking exit meter required. All in all would go back.

Everyone was very nice. They accommodated my early check-in. The maintenance crew and housekeeping were all so great. I would definitely recommend this hotel. The pool was nice. It is not a deep pool though but perfect for lounging. The breakfast was ok. They provide a good variety.
Manager Response: Dear Christina D,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review and sharing your feedback with others on TripAdvisor! We greatly appreciate your comments and can’t express to you our gratitude for your kind words about our hotel and our colleagues. I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!   Yours in Hospitality,

Summary Heading: When we talk about "bad" hotels now, we talk about this place.
Summary: Probably the worst experience we've had in a hotel.  Room was slightly dirty, complete with cockroaches.  You could hear every noise from rooms around, stair cases, balconies, etc.  Breakfast was absolutely terrible.  They managed to ruin biscuits and gravy - no small feat.  And staff was slightly rude.
Manager Response: Dear John P,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I am very disappointed to hear about your experience at the hotel. We are committed to providing our guests with the highest quality services and facilities. It seems that we were not able to execute an exemplary hotel stay.  Please accept our sincere apologies for any discomfort it may have caused you. The feedback we receive from our valued guests, like you, enables us to target problem areas. We welcome any opportunity to improve.  We know you have many choices when it comes to lodging and we hope you will continue to choose Cortona Inn & Suites for your travel needs.  Sincerely,

Summary: No frills, standard accommodations.  Room was clean and comfortable and had a motel feel to it.  I was on the 2nd floor and you could hear noise from outside and above but nothing out of the ordinary.  The bathroom fan is really loud.  Location is good to disneyland either walking to the park or across the street is the Toy Story lot that you can catch a free shuttle.  Was there for only 1 night for a quick trip to Disney.  Didn't use the pool or have breakfast.  Front desk said 24 hour but I called at 4am to checkout for a flight and there was no answer on the phone & door was locked.
Manager Response: Dear StarDori,  First of all, thank you very much for your recent stay at our hotel. We strive to accommodate all of our guests and their needs and I’m disappointed that we did not meet your expectations with regards to the front desk not being available early in the morning. We take all reviews positive and negative very seriously, and your feedback will help us improve for our next guest or your next visit.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: I liked how they have free parking for one car, offer free continental breakfast, and their cleaning staff was very friendly.  My roommate was feeling sick (stomach flu) and threw up in the bathtub in the middle of the night.  When I explained to the staff that we discarded a soiled towel in the trash, he was accommodating of our situation.  Walking to the Anaheim Convention Center took about 7 minutes?  We also requested a rollaway bed, which was a bit pricey for one night.  I also wish that their check-in and check-out times were a little more flexible, and that access to the electrical sockets was easier (for charging multiple devices).  But with free wi-fi and breakfast, it's an awesome deal compared to the other hotels around.  I actually found our room to be as comfortable
Manager Response: Dear davyface,  Thanks for staying with us! We're glad you enjoyed our great location in Anaheim. We hope you stay with us again in the future.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: The stay was good but very pricey for a motel due to its location . It was convenient for what we wanted but I would go for a less expensive choice next time . It is walking distance to the convention center and Disneyland
Manager Response: Dear Carol M,  Thanks for sharing your valuable feedback with regards to our hotel.  Cortona Inn & Suites always located in the convenience place.  We hope our customers can feel more relaxed no matter they are on work or in travel.  We look forward to your next trip!  Sincerely,

Summary: Everything was neat and clean, although property shows signs of being older and in need of a face lift.   Appreciate the tidy bathroom with sufficient water pressure and temperature.   Rooms are set back from the street, so minimal to no street noise.   Bed was comfortable and I'm particular.   Air conditioner sometimes a bit noisy but did not keep us awake.  Walking distance to Anaheim Convention Center a major plus, as well as the complimentary parking.   The reception and dining room staff were excellent, very professional and pleasant. Would choose Cortona Inn again for brief stays.
Manager Response: Dear 3grrr,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review and sharing your feedback with others on TripAdvisor! We greatly appreciate your comments and can’t express to you our gratitude for your kind words about our hotel and our colleagues. I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!   Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Great location friendly staff and very clean. Comfortable beds. The breakfast was very filling and each day had a different selection. Close to convention center and across from Toy Story Parking lot.
Manager Response: Dear Coletta B.,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review and sharing your feedback with others on TripAdvisor! We greatly appreciate your comments and can’t express to you our gratitude for your kind words about our hotel and our colleagues. I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!   Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Room served it's purpose.  We only were there to sleep.  The parking lot was always full and had to roam around a few times before making our own parking spot.  And breakfast was not the variety I was expecting, but at least there was something available to guests.
Manager Response: Dear Claudia R.  Thank you for choosing our hotel and for your comments. We greatly appreciate your feedback and take each one of your concerns to heart. We look forward in welcoming you back soon!  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary Heading: Great hotel, perfect location, excellent price.
Summary: The hotel is amazing with an strategic close location to Disneyland, exceeded my expectations, the room is very clean and it looks like it was remodeled recently. The staff very kind. Not any issues. The price is perfect. Verónica had an amazing customer service!!!
Manager Response: Dear JORGE C,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review and sharing your feedback with others on TripAdvisor! We greatly appreciate your comments and can't express to you our gratitude for your kind words about our hotel and our colleagues. I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel next time you are in Anaheim!  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary Heading: Great location and good hotel with decent breakfast
Summary: Good for sleeping. Breakfast was included. Wish there is a view from the window. Great location since it is really close to Anaheim convention centre. Not too far from Disneyland and surrounded by shops and restaurants in walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear alextheraa,  Thank you for choosing us for your recent visit.  I'm glad to hear that you found our location convenient.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: If you’re here for the theme parks then this is it. Very simple, basic, over-priced hotel ... and yet it is quiet and convenient to stay with your family. The location it in walking distance to the attractions, restaurants and stores. They offer free Basic breakfast and free parking (I didn’t used it, Uber did good job in the transportation). Good air conditioning unit for a good night sleep. Within 12 minutes to the mainplace mall and 10 minutes from the orange outlets. We have enjoyed our stay for 5 nights. Definitely we will come back again and I encourage my friends and family to choose this hotel if they are looking to enjoy the area not the hotel!.
Manager Response: Dear abdullahaD3246HP,  Thank you for staying with us!  I appreciate you taking the time to comment about your recent stay at our hotel. We know you have many choices when it comes to lodging and we hope you will continue to choose Cortona Inn & Suites for your travel needs.  Yours in Hospitality!

Summary: Nice room safe in a out a 3 block walk to Disneyland right across front he buzz lightyear parking lot so you can use that bus to not have to walk or need to wait for a shuttle. Very nice staff and accommodating.  I would surely stay here again. For sub $100 it's a solid location. Parking can be tough at night I am told that is where the walking distance comes I  handy to visit the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Andre N,  Thank you for choosing Cortona Inn.  We are happy to see you enjoyed your stay!  We look forward to your next visit!  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: It's clean and nice and good for sleeping.  I wish there was a shuttle to Disneyland because it is a very LONG walk especially when coming back at night.  The breakfast was ok.  The usual type of continental breakfast items along with egg patties and sausage patties.
Manager Response: Dear Susie C,  We are very happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay and our buffet breakfast.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to our beautiful city and we hope you can take advantage of the ART shuttle service (additional fees applies).

Summary: Older hotel.  Clean but not anything spectacular. If you are looking for just a clean place to stay, I would recommend.  If you are expecting nice modern accommodations, you will be disappointed.  The staff were very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear JDD033,  I appreciate you taking the time to comment about your recent stay at our hotel.  We are glad you found our rooms comfortable and clean and found our staff efficient and friendly.   We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The hotel rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable. Breakfast was good and so nice to have before we took off for the day to walk all over Disneyland. The staff were very accommodating and friendly. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear jkool53,  Thank you so much for choosing Cortona Inn & Suites.  I am happy to hear that we met and exceeded expectations.  We love our Breakfast and we appreciate all the positive feedback and look forward to assisting you again when your travels return you to the area.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary Heading: Great hotel for stays at Disneyland
Summary: Room was just as it was described on the website.  Buffet Breakfast was tasty.  AC in the room was well supplied.  Decent distance from Disneyland Theme Park.  Front staff was very friendly upon check in and very helpful at checkout.  Parking was adequate but because it was shared with another hotel resort, we found ourselves circling the parking area to get a spot and had to park in a red zone which was disconcerting.
Manager Response: Dear Scott C,  I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you for the terrific review and for recognizing our great team for taking care of you.  I am glad that you enjoyed the hotel, and on behalf of all of us,   Thank you again.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Clean, family friendly and everyone is helpful. The only issue with this place is their smal parking lot but other than that, everything was excellent. Very responsive to any request, very polite and very close to the Disneyland park. It took me 2 min to get there walking.
Manager Response: Dear Mariliareyes,  We are thankful and very much appreciative that you have taken the time to post about your recent stay oat our property.  We are privileged to have a great team of colleagues that constantly deliver a unique guest experience.  Your kind word about the outstanding service delivered throughout your stay is a testament to the hard work they all put in day to day to exceed your expectations.  We look forward to having you here with us again in the near future.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: The room was good sized. The kids loved the bunk beds (even though they were arranged in the room weird). The sofa was dirty and the sofa bed was hard to sleep on, but the other other beds were comfy. We slept well, except when we could here people coming in late from Disney. The walls were very thin! I could hear people loudly going down the hall. I could also hear other people's babies cry (which woke me up thinking it was my baby) and someone took a shower which again woke me up because the water going through the pipes was soooooo loud! The breakfast tasted good, but there weren't many options. Overall it was worth the money and the location was good.
Manager Response: Dear fuzziesquirel,  Thank you for staying with us!  We're sorry you were unhappy - we'll work hard to fix the issues you experienced. We look forward in welcoming you in the near future.  Yours in Hospitality.

Summary: Our first room had ants on the bedside table but didn’t find them until the middle of the night. The hotel did change rooms for us and we didn’t have any issues with that one. The front desk staff were very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Tiffanie H.  Thank you for staying with us!  We look forward in welcoming you soon!

Summary: This hotel was wonderful. We were taking some friends to Disney for the first time in a while and we're trying to find a hotel that was comfortable and close to the parks. Having the hotel sit away from the street really helped escape the noise and the breakfast was a so good. A great way to be able to start and end the day. Super comfortable beds and a nice room set up. Overall a fantastic stay!
Manager Response: Dear Rockerwolf12,  Thank you so much for choosing Cortona Inn & Suites, Anaheim Resort, for your recent visit to Anaheim. I am happy to hear that we met and exceeded expectations. We love our Breakfast and we appreciate all the positive feedback and look forward to assisting you again when your travels return you to the area.  Yours in hospitality,

Summary Heading: Family Suites and FREE Tesla Charging
Summary: Amazing property just 3 blocks from Disneyland. It is our favorite place to stay. They have a good breakfast, FREE Tesla charging, and comfortable beds. We have stayed multiple times, and the staff has always been more than helpful.

Summary Heading: Not exactly the Ritz, but it's a solid base of operations for a few days
Summary: Unsurprisingly, the pictures on their website of the hotel grounds are fairly misleading. The pool is not large and lively with crystal-clear water, the rooms are not big and bright, and you're likely not going to be enjoying a top-quality breakfast feast. Then again, if one is booking a relatively cheap room right next to the convention centre and Disneyland, one really shouldn't expect anything else.  I stayed in an inexpensive room with a working AC, clean bathrooms, and relatively comfortable bedding. The room was a little bit dingy and the walls were fairly thin, so it was a bit difficult to relax when guests were passing by the main door or chatting in an adjacent room, but overall, the hotel was safe, convenient, and comfortable enough for an inexpensive stay. Staff were
Manager Response: Dear beyondly,  Thank you for choosing Cortona Inn. We are happy to see you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to your next visit!  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: We stayed here before a few years ago and had a pretty good experience so we booked it for our most recent Disney trip! I got a pretty good deal on another travel site. The hotel looked to be in the middle of a renovation- the staff was working on quite a few rooms near ours. New carpet, mattresses and other work was going in. We had a two queen room. The room was clean and there was plenty of hot water. Comfy beds but the walls are thin. A bit too far to walk to the Disney resort but really close to the toy story lot where you can catch the bus to Disney. They do offer breakfast which was a pretty standard continental breakfast with some hot options too.
Manager Response: Dear Jaime H,  We are very happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay and our buffet breakfast. Also glad to hear you found our location convenient.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary Heading: Good place to stay w/in walking distance of Disneyland
Summary: Staff were very friendly, maid filled our requests for more washcloths, room was clean and comfortable. The building seems to be pretty old and our room smelled like mildew. But the one main problem we had was that the bed was right up to the edge of the heating/air conditioning unit, making it necessary for the person on that side of the bed to crawl up from the foot of the bed.
Manager Response: Dear jorikschells 10  I appreciate you taking the time to comment about your recent stay at our hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back to our establishment. Once again thank you for the wonderful comments.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: My family of 4 with two children under 4 recently stayed at the Cortona Inn. We decided on a regular King room and it was very spacious and very comfortable. There was plenty of room for our pack and play, and playroom for the kids. The pool was beautiful and we really enjoyed the breakfast in the morning. Much better options than other nearby hotels. The hotel offers a shuttle at an up charge however we recommend skipping this one and walking across the street to the free Toy Story lot. The shuttles there are free and frequent. Be advised that parking for one car only is covered, even in suites so plan accordingly. There is a cute Disney giftshop in the lobby with pretty good choices and actually some options that weren’t offered in the Emporium at Main Street.
Manager Response: Dear Magicmom365,  I appreciate you taking the time to comment about your recent stay at our hotel. We are glad you found our rooms comfortable and clean and found our staff efficient and friendly. We are truly touched and grateful for your very kind review. We look forward to welcoming you back to our establishment. Once again thank you for the wonderful comments.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Great price for the location and free parking n breakfast. Great n helpful staff. They were effective n courteous. Next time I will be sure to stay here again n reccomend to friends. Also close to the beaches.
Manager Response: Dear Michael B.  I appreciate you taking the time to comment about your recent stay at our hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back to our establishment. Once again thank you for the wonderful comments and kind words of praise for our staff.  Look forward in welcoming you soon!

Summary: Nice clean, comfortable room, easy checkin. Breakfast is a step up from continental. Eggs, sausage, potatoes, fruit, cereal, pastries, juice and coffee. Plenty of parking and conveniently located to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Kmsjouney,  Thank you so much for choosing Cortona Inn & Suites, Anaheim Resort, for your recent visit to Anaheim. I am happy to hear that we met and exceeded expectations. Summary: My boyfriend and I were pleasantly impressed by everything! The check in process went very smooth and the staff was friendly from the beginning. The room was spacious, the beds were comfy and the continental breakfast was great! Definitely will return!
Manager Response: Dear Ryan M.  Thank you so much for the wonderful review and sharing your feedback with others on TripAdvisor! Summary: This was a very nice hotel, itbis older and shows some wear but is clean. We are a family of 4 and stayed in a family suite, the kids liked having their own room. There was plenty of storage for our luggage, food, and extra vacation stuff. The bathrooms were on the smaller size and there wasnt another mirror to get ready in the morning. Plenty of parking, pool was clean, was nice to have breakfast every morning before we went on out way. It is walkimg distance from Disneyland but we were smart and walked across the street to the disney parking lot, hopped on the bus and was delivered right to the gate, super nice when your tired at night. All in all would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Astin K, Thanks for staying with us! We're glad you enjoyed our great location in Anaheim. We hope you stay with us again in the future.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: We arrived after 1:00am and left by 11:00am.  Anything more would have been too long.  It was quiet until morning but HAIR was everywhere and the breakfast was lackluster.  The rate would have been okay if they didn't add so much in "resort" fees.  This is not a resort. Night clerk was super nice and allowed me to park in EV area when all other parking was taken, but other than that I would not recommend or stay again.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel a couple times for my Disney trips and every time I leave I can’t wait to come back. The staff is AWESOME and just the Sweetest! They offer a really good breakfast!! And the rooms are all always Super Clean and ready when needed(sometimes even early but you have to check first) the BEDS are the most relaxing part and i could sleep in them forever! They are close to the Disney Bus stop or you can take 15 mins and walk over there! Just the BEST

Summary Heading: always come here when i stay in anaheim
Summary: this place is my favorite to stay at, clean and right by the shuttle.  They even let you park your car way before check in time. They're super accommodating. The gift shop even has discounted disney pins! Will come back.

Summary: Hotel was clean and very affordable considering all the other locations in the area . Plus a free breakfast which also helped out if your in a budget. We had a good stay room was clean. A bit smaller then we thought but for the price you can’t complain.

Summary Heading: Great find during a last minute booking search!
Summary: The hotel staff was very friendly. The room was clean with comfortable beds, and we added an equally comfy roll away bed for an additional 50 bucks. We booked last minute on our way to Disneyland, and no other surrounding hotel beat the price. Will definitely stay again.

This was our first time in Anaheim and we wanted something close to Disney, affordable, comfortable, and with breakfast. Cortona fit the bill! We had a nice stay- the bed was comfy, breakfast was filling, location was good, staff were all friendly and helpful. My only note is that the room felt *very* basic: there was almost no decoration of the room itself (we had a suite), and the "living room" didn't have a coffee table. Did this affect our stay or our time in Anaheim? Nope, just wanted to point it out.   As for the location: it's about a 15-20 minute walk to Disneyland. The ART shuttle is $5.50 per day and can take you to Disney from a stop a few doors down from the hotel. We ended up using the shuttle, since we knew we'd already be walking all day at the park. In the

The place is good if the intention is having a ok place just to sleep (and have breakfast). The beds are comfy and the room is good size.   Cons: the room smells like it was closed for a long tome and the AC doesn’t help it to smell better (it could give you allergies).

We stay here every time we go to Disneyland. It is Affordable, clean, good hot breakfast. Pooll and jacuzzi are nice. Awesome gift shop to get Disney gear that is cheaper than in the park. Easy walk to the park and you don’t have to pay for parking.  I would highly recommend it

Nice clean room, standard amenities and convenient location for going to Disneyland. There was a lot of noise from the room above us with constant stomping and walls do seem thin. The parking was crammed but there is a parking garage under the shared property with the other hotel. Overall not great or not bad but good enough.
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us! We're glad you enjoyed our great location in Anaheim. We hope you stay with us again in the future.  Have a Magical Day!

Summary Heading: Good location for walkers; think twice if you are expecting too sleep

Even upgraded is to a suite without asking.       Location.   A slight trek down to the corner and across the street puts you at the toy story parking lot pickup for Disney.      Room was clean , with the bed being extremely comfortable.         Average not  breakfast but filling enough to be included in the price of the roo m      the bad      parking was somewhat of a hit or miss.     Don't expect to park anywhere near your room unless you just kick out   Very bad.   We were on the second floor and the noise was awful.   You could not only hear a car start in the parking lot but the floor above u s was just constant

Summary: Booked my Disney trip thru Costco and they picked this hotel, not me. Personally I would have given it a better rating if we had the room with bunk beds. Instead it was 2 queen beds. My family has 4 people, so it does tend to get tight on space. And when you want to come back to rest from walking all day at Disney, you dont want to feel like your on top of each other. Pros: very comfortable beds and pillows. Hot breakfast in am. ART shuttle picks up and drops off to Disney/hotel every 20 minutes all day. Literally about 10 min or less drive to Disney. Summary Heading: Close to Disney but Mostly Average
Summary: The Cortona Inn's main selling point is that it's next door to Disneyland at a great low price and has a bus stop right outside the parking lot to shuttle you to Disney ($3 on bus, $3.50 front desk per person per day). However, as hotels go, there was room for some improvement. The breakfast was average without much selection. No restaurant inside (we did stop by the hotel restaurant next door though) We had a group of 4 for 4 nights and never got fresh dry towels despite leaving the several times used wet ones on the ground and had to get some from the front desk on the third day. The safe never had a key either. Gift shop was nice. Front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. Check in went smoothly and they had our vacation package ready to go. Summary: My bestfriend and I were looking for a cheap but nice hotel to stay at for one night that was walking distance from Disneyland and offered free parking and this place fulfilled all of our needs. We arrived early to park before heading over to Disneyland and we were able to check in early and enjoy provided breakfast before our day which was a huge bonus we were not expecting. The staff was so nice, particularly the young man working the front desk. The beds were super comfortable. The first floor was pretty loud in the morning with everyone walking by, definitely thin walls, but perfect for the price and fit everything we were looking for. About a 15 minute walk to Disney that was easy, just follow the crowd of people in mickey ears. Would stay again!

Summary Heading: Great stay, comfy beds, friendly staff, good location!
Summary: The location was good. We actually walked to Disneyland (about 20 minutes) and rode the Toy Story bus back in the evenings. A little more walking than I wanted sometimes, but it worked and the price was great. The beds were very comfortable. The pillows were plentiful, but extremely fluffy and firm. We were glad to have a few of our own. We stayed in a bunk bed 2 room suite, and it was great. Nice and spacious. Decent breakfast, very helpful staff, parking was busy, but easy to get in and out. We didn't try the pool. Only cons were being woken by lots of pounding feet late at night (even with noise machines) and some mold in the bathroom. (Not a lot, but it was there.) Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, Close to Disney Parks!
Summary: The Cortona Inn is a really nice and simple place to stay if you are going to the Disney parks. Free parking and free breakfast were a plus compared to lots of other hotels in the area. About 5 minutes walk to the Toy Story Parking lot for free shuttles to the Disney parks. The free shuttles drops you off right by the entrance to the two Disney parks and downtown Disney. It’s all the same drop off and pick up area. The breakfast was decent, enough to choose from to start your day. Example of breakfast, sausage, eggs, biscuits with gravy, pancakes, waffles, English muffins, toast, mini muffins, fruits, yogurt, juices, tea, coffee. We thought it was decent enough before heading out for the big day at the Disney parks. Rooms were well kept. Pool and hot tub was nice. Pool could

Summary: The room was clean and everything worked inside. The staff was nice and everywhere outside was clean and neat. Bus stopped right out at the road almost so that was nice. Summary Heading: First time staying at this hotel
Summary: This was our first time staying at this hotel . We usually stay elsewhere . We liked that they didn’t charge us for parking unlike other hotels . The breakfast was Satisfying enough to get us through until lunch . They change it up every day which is nice .Consist of cold cereal , toast , waffles , fruits . Then warm sausage , eggs, potatoes. The rooms are a bit run down but clean. I would not consider this hotel walking distance to Disneyland. I would not consider staying here again, for that reason . You can catch the Toy story bus, but it takes you about 10 minutes to get there . Good enough I guess , since the total walk from the hotel to Disneyland is 20 mins . For the price we paid it was good enough .

I expected noisy, after all kids and Disneyland! Parking was good, underground garage available when the near hotel filled up, secure and not a long walk. The breakfast was good, lots of choices.  Did not have time for a swim this trip but looked clean. We walked
